00084     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00085     // Multipole Interaction Class //
00086     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00087 
00088     class Interactor
00089     {
00090     public:
00091 
00092         Interactor(Topology *top, EMultipole *em) : _top(top), _em(em) {};
00093         Interactor() : _top(NULL), _em(NULL) {};
00094        ~Interactor() {};
00095                
00096         // UNITS IN INPUT FILES
00097         // ... Always use atomic units
00098         // ... ... Positions in a0 (bohr)
00099         // ... ... Multipole moment of rank k in e(a0)**k
00100         // ... ... Dipole polarizability in A³ (Angstrom cubed)
00101        
00102         // UNITS USED INTERNALLY
00103         // ... Use nm instead of a0 and A
00104         // ... ... Positions in nm
00105         // ... ... Multipole moment of rank k in e(nm)**k
00106         // ... ... Dipole polarizability in nm³
00107 
00108         // CONVERSION FACTORS
00109         // ... Electric field (N/C) = Electric field (int)
00110         //                          * 1/4PiEps0(SI) * e * 1e+18
00111         // ... Energy (eV) = Energy (int) * 1/4PiEps0(SI) * e * 1e+09
00112         //
00113         // ... Potential (V) = Potential(int) * 1/4PiEps0(SI) * e * 1e+0.9
00114 
00115 
00116         inline double EnergyInter(PolarSite &pol1, PolarSite &pol2);
00117         inline double EnergyInterESP(PolarSite &pol1, PolarSite &pol2);
00118         inline double EnergyIntra(PolarSite &pol1, PolarSite &pol2);
00119         inline void FieldPerm(PolarSite &pol1, PolarSite &pol2);
00120         inline vec  FieldPermESF(vec r, PolarSite &pol);
00121         inline void FieldIndu(PolarSite &pol1, PolarSite &pol2);
00122         inline void FieldInduAlpha(PolarSite &pol1, PolarSite &pol2);
00123 
00124         inline double PotentialPerm(vec r, PolarSite &pol);
00125         
00126         void ResetEnergy() { EP = EU_INTER = EU_INTRA = 0.0; }
00127         double &getEP() { return EP; }
00128         double &getEU_INTER() { return EU_INTER; }
00129         double &getEU_INTRA() { return EU_INTRA; }
00130 
00131     private:
00132 
00133         double EP;       //   <- Interaction permanent multipoles (inter-site)
00134         double EU_INTRA; //   <- Interaction induction multipoles (intra-site)
00135         double EU_INTER; //   <- Interaction induction multipoles (inter-site)
00136 
00137 
00138         vec    e12;     //  |
00139         double u3;      //  |-> NOTE: Only needed when using Thole model
00140         double a;       //  |         (do not forget to init. though...)
00141 
00142         double R;       //  |
00143         double R2;      //  |
00144         double R3;      //  |-> NOTE: reciprocal, i.e. e.g. R3 = 1/(R*R*R)
00145         double R4;      //  |
00146         double R5;      //  |
00147 
00148         double rax, ray, raz;
00149         double rbx, rby, rbz;
00150         double cxx, cxy, cxz;
00151         double cyx, cyy, cyz;
00152         double czx, czy, czz;
00153 
00154         inline double lambda3() { return 1 - exp( -a*u3); }
00155         inline double lambda5() { return 1 - (1 + a*u3) * exp( -a*u3); }
00156         inline double lambda7() { return 1 - (1 + a*u3 + 0.6*a*a*u3*u3) * exp( -a*u3); }
00157         inline double lambda9() { return 1 - (1 + a*u3 + (18*a*a*u3*u3 + 9*a*a*a*u3*u3*u3)/35) * exp( -a*u3); }
00158 
00159         inline double T00_00() { return R; }
00160 
00161         inline double T1x_00() { return R2 * rax; }
00162         inline double T1y_00() { return R2 * ray; }
00163         inline double T1z_00() { return R2 * raz; }
00164         inline double T00_1x() { return R2 * rbx; }
00165         inline double T00_1y() { return R2 * rby; }
00166         inline double T00_1z() { return R2 * rbz; }
00167 
00168         inline double TU1x_00() { return lambda3() * R2 * rax; }
00169         inline double TU1y_00() { return lambda3() * R2 * ray; }
00170         inline double TU1z_00() { return lambda3() * R2 * raz; }
00171         inline double TU00_1x() { return lambda3() * R2 * rbx; }
00172         inline double TU00_1y() { return lambda3() * R2 * rby; }
00173         inline double TU00_1z() { return lambda3() * R2 * rbz; }
00174 
00175         inline double T20_00()  { return R3 * 0.5 * (3 * raz*raz - 1); }
00176         inline double T21c_00() { return R3 * sqrt(3) * rax * raz; }
00177         inline double T21s_00() { return R3 * sqrt(3) * ray * raz; }
00178         inline double T22c_00() { return R3 * 0.5 * sqrt(3) * (rax*rax - ray*ray); }
00179         inline double T22s_00() { return R3 * sqrt(3) * rax*ray; }
00180         inline double T00_20()  { return R3 * 0.5 * (3 * rbz*rbz - 1); }
00181         inline double T00_21c() { return R3 * sqrt(3) * rbx * rbz; }
00182         inline double T00_21s() { return R3 * sqrt(3) * rby * rbz; }
00183         inline double T00_22c() { return R3 * 0.5 * sqrt(3) * (rbx*rbx - rby*rby); }
00184         inline double T00_22s() { return R3 * sqrt(3) * rbx*rby; }
00185 
00186         inline double T1x_1x() { return R3 * (3 * rax*rbx + cxx); }
00187         inline double T1x_1y() { return R3 * (3 * rax*rby + cxy); }
00188         inline double T1x_1z() { return R3 * (3 * rax*rbz + cxz); }
00189         inline double T1y_1x() { return R3 * (3 * ray*rbx + cyx); }
00190         inline double T1y_1y() { return R3 * (3 * ray*rby + cyy); }
00191         inline double T1y_1z() { return R3 * (3 * ray*rbz + cyz); }
00192         inline double T1z_1x() { return R3 * (3 * raz*rbx + czx); }
00193         inline double T1z_1y() { return R3 * (3 * raz*rby + czy); }
00194         inline double T1z_1z() { return R3 * (3 * raz*rbz + czz); }
00195 
00196         inline double TU1x_1x() { return R3 * (lambda5()*3*rax*rbx + lambda3()*cxx); }
00197         inline double TU1x_1y() { return R3 * (lambda5()*3*rax*rby + lambda3()*cxy); }
00198         inline double TU1x_1z() { return R3 * (lambda5()*3*rax*rbz + lambda3()*cxz); }
00199         inline double TU1y_1x() { return R3 * (lambda5()*3*ray*rbx + lambda3()*cyx); }
00200         inline double TU1y_1y() { return R3 * (lambda5()*3*ray*rby + lambda3()*cyy); }
00201         inline double TU1y_1z() { return R3 * (lambda5()*3*ray*rbz + lambda3()*cyz); }
00202         inline double TU1z_1x() { return R3 * (lambda5()*3*raz*rbx + lambda3()*czx); }
00203         inline double TU1z_1y() { return R3 * (lambda5()*3*raz*rby + lambda3()*czy); }
00204         inline double TU1z_1z() { return R3 * (lambda5()*3*raz*rbz + lambda3()*czz); }
00205 
00206         inline double T20_1x()  { return R4 * 0.5 * (15*raz*raz*rbx + 6*raz*czx - 3*rbx); }
00207         inline double T20_1y()  { return R4 * 0.5 * (15*raz*raz*rby + 6*raz*czy - 3*rby); }
00208         inline double T20_1z()  { return R4 * 0.5 * (15*raz*raz*rbz + 6*raz*czz - 3*rbz); }
00209         inline double T21c_1x() { return R4 * sqrt(3) * (rax*czx + cxx*raz + 5*rax*raz*rbx); }
00210         inline double T21c_1y() { return R4 * sqrt(3) * (rax*czy + cxy*raz + 5*rax*raz*rby); }
00211         inline double T21c_1z() { return R4 * sqrt(3) * (rax*czz + cxz*raz + 5*rax*raz*rbz); }
00212         inline double T21s_1x() { return R4 * sqrt(3) * (ray*czx + cyx*raz + 5*ray*raz*rbx); }
00213         inline double T21s_1y() { return R4 * sqrt(3) * (ray*czy + cyy*raz + 5*ray*raz*rby); }
00214         inline double T21s_1z() { return R4 * sqrt(3) * (ray*czz + cyz*raz + 5*ray*raz*rbz); }
00215         inline double T22c_1x() { return R4 * 0.5 * sqrt(3) * ( 5*(rax*rax-ray*ray)*rbx + 2*rax*cxx - 2*ray*cyx); }
00216         inline double T22c_1y() { return R4 * 0.5 * sqrt(3) * ( 5*(rax*rax-ray*ray)*rby + 2*rax*cxy - 2*ray*cyy); }
00217         inline double T22c_1z() { return R4 * 0.5 * sqrt(3) * ( 5*(rax*rax-ray*ray)*rbz + 2*rax*cxz - 2*ray*cyz); }
00218         inline double T22s_1x() { return R4 * sqrt(3) * ( 5*rax*ray*rbx + rax*cyx + ray*cxx ); }
00219         inline double T22s_1y() { return R4 * sqrt(3) * ( 5*rax*ray*rby + rax*cyy + ray*cxy ); }
00220         inline double T22s_1z() { return R4 * sqrt(3) * ( 5*rax*ray*rbz + rax*cyz + ray*cxz ); }

00222         inline double T1x_20()  { return R4 * 0.5 * (15*rbz*rbz*rax + 6*rbz*cxz - 3*rax); }

00282         inline double T22c_22c() { return R5 * 0.25 * (35*rax*rax*rbx*rbx - 35*rax*rax*rby*rby - 35*ray*ray*rbx*rbx + 35*ray*ray*rby*rby + 20*rax*rbx*cxx - 20*rax*rby*cxy - 20*ray*rbx*cyx + 20*ray*rby*cyy + 2*cxx*cxx - 2*cxy*cxy - 2*cyx*cyx + 2*cyy*cyy); }
00283         inline double T22c_22s() { return R5 * 0.5 * (35*rax*rax*rbx*rby - 35*ray*ray*rbx*rby + 10*rax*rbx*cxy + 10*rax*rby*cxx - 10*ray*rbx*cyy - 10*ray*rby*cyx + 2*cxx*cxy - 2*cyx*cyy); }
00284         inline double T22s_22s() { return R5 * (35*rax*ray*rbx*rby + 5*rax*rbx*cyy + 5*rax*rby*cyx + 5*ray*rbx*cxy + 5*ray*rby*cxx + cxx*cyy + cxy*cyx); }
00285 
00286         inline double T21c_20()  { return R5 * 0.5 * sqrt(3) * (35*rbz*rbz*rax*raz - 5*rax*raz + 10*rbz*rax*czz + 10*rbz*raz*cxz + 2*cxz*czz); }
00287         inline double T21s_20()  { return R5 * 0.5 * sqrt(3) * (35*rbz*rbz*ray*raz - 5*ray*raz + 10*rbz*ray*czz + 10*rbz*raz*cyz + 2*cyz*czz); }
00288         inline double T22c_20()  { return R5 * 0.25 * sqrt(3) * (35*rbz*rbz*rax*rax - 35*rbz*rbz*ray*ray - 5*rax*rax + 5*ray*ray + 20*rbz*rax*cxz - 20*rbz*ray*cyz + 2*cxz*cxz - 2*cyz*cyz); }
00289         inline double T22s_20()  { return R5 * 0.5 * sqrt(3) * (35*rbz*rbz*rax*ray - 5*rax*ray + 10*rbz*rax*cyz + 10*rbz*ray*cxz + 2*cxz*cyz); }
00290         inline double T21s_21c() { return R5 * (35*rbx*rbz*ray*raz + 5*rbx*ray*czz + 5*rbx*raz*cyz + 5*rbz*ray*czx + 5*rbz*raz*cyx + cyx*czz + czx*cyz); }
00291         inline double T22c_21c() { return R5 * 0.5 * (35*rbx*rbz*rax*rax - 35*rbx*rbz*ray*ray + 10*rbx*rax*cxz - 10*rbx*ray*cyz + 10*rbz*rax*cxx - 10*rbz*ray*cyx + 2*cxx*cxz - 2*cyx*cyz); }
00292         inline double T22s_21c() { return R5 * (35*rbx*rbz*rax*ray + 5*rbx*rax*cyz + 5*rbx*ray*cxz + 5*rbz*rax*cyx + 5*rbz*ray*cxx + cxx*cyz + cyx*cxz); }
00293         inline double T22c_21s() { return R5 * 0.5 * (35*rby*rbz*rax*rax - 35*rby*rbz*ray*ray + 10*rby*rax*cxz - 10*rby*ray*cyz + 10*rbz*rax*cxy - 10*rbz*ray*cyy + 2*cxy*cxz - 2*cyy*cyz); }
00294         inline double T22s_21s() { return R5 * (35*rby*rbz*rax*ray + 5*rby*rax*cyz + 5*rby*ray*cxz + 5*rbz*rax*cyy + 5*rbz*ray*cxy + cxy*cyz + cyy*cxz); }
00295         inline double T22s_22c() { return R5 * 0.5 * (35*rbx*rbx*rax*ray - 35*rby*rby*rax*ray + 10*rbx*rax*cyx + 10*rbx*ray*cxx - 10*rby*rax*cyy - 10*rby*ray*cxy + 2*cxx*cyx - 2*cxy*cyy); }
00296 
00297         Topology        *_top;
00298         EMultipole     *_em;
00299 
00300     };
00301 
00302 
00303     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00304     // Site workers (i.e. individual threads) //
00305     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00306 
00307     class SiteOpMultipole : public Thread
00308     {
00309     public:
00310 
00311         SiteOpMultipole(int id, Topology *top,
00312                      EMultipole *master)
00313                    : _id(id), _top(top), _seg(NULL),
00314                      _master(master)     
00315                    { _actor = Interactor(top,_master); };
00316 
00317        ~SiteOpMultipole();
00318 
00319         int  getId() { return _id; }
00320         void setId(int id) { _id = id; }
00321 
00322         void InitSlotData(Topology *top);
00323         void Run(void);
00324 
00325         void   EvalSite(Topology *top, Segment *seg);
00326         void   Charge(int state);
00327         int    Induce(int state);
00328         double Energy(int state);
00329         double EnergyStatic(int state);
00330         void   Depolarize();
00331 
00332 
00333     public:
00334 
00335         int                           _id;
00336         Topology                     *_top;
00337         Segment                      *_seg;
00338         EMultipole                  *_master;
00339 
00340         vector< Segment* >           _segsPolSphere; // Segments    in c/o 0-1
00341         vector< Segment* >           _segsOutSphere; // Segments    in c/0 1-2
00342         vector< vector<PolarSite*> > _polsPolSphere; // Polar sites in c/o 0-1
00343         vector< vector<PolarSite*> > _polsOutSphere; // Polar sites in c/o 1-2
00344         vector< vector<PolarSite*> > _polarSites;    // Copy of top polar sites
00345         Interactor                   _actor;
00346     };
00347 
00348 
00349 private:
00350 
00351     // Allocation of polar sites to fragments and segments
00352     map<string, vector<PolarSite*> >     _map_seg_polarSites;
00353     map<string, vector<bool> >           _map_seg_chrgStates;
00354     map<string, vector<int> >            _alloc_frag_mpoleIdx;
00355     map<string, vector<string> >         _alloc_frag_mpoleName;
00356     map<string, bool>                    _map2md;
00357 
00358     // Thread management
00359     vector<Segment*> ::iterator _nextSite;
00360     Mutex                       _nextSiteMutex;
00361     Mutex                       _coutMutex;
00362     Mutex                       _logMutex;
00363     bool                        _maverick;
00364 
00365     // Control options
00366     bool            _induce;
00367     int             _firstSeg;
00368     int             _lastSeg;
00369     string          _checkPolesPDB;
00370 
00371     // ESP
00372     bool            _calcESP;
00373     bool            _ESPdoSystem;
00374     string          _espCubeFile;
00375     string          _espOutFile;
00376     vector<vec>     _cube;
00377 
00378     // ESF
00379     bool            _calcESF;
00380     string          _esfGridFile;
00381     string          _esfOutFile;
00382     vector<vec>     _esfGrid;
00383 
00384     // MolPol
00385     bool            _calcAlphaMol;
00386     bool            _doSystem;
00387     string          _alphaOutFile;
00388 
00389     // Logging
00390     string          _outFile;
00391     bool            _energies2File;
00392     map<int,vector<int> > _log_seg_iter;
00393     map<int,int>    _log_seg_sphereSize;
00394     map<int,vec>    _log_seg_com;
00395 
00396     // Interaction parameters
00397     bool            _useCutoff;
00398     double          _cutoff;
00399     double          _cutoff2;
00400     bool            _useExp;
00401     double          _aDamp;
00402     bool            _useScaling;
00403     vector<double>  _scale1;
00404 
00405     // Convergence parameters
00406     float           _wSOR_N;
00407     float           _wSOR_C;
00408     double          _epsTol;
00409     int             _maxIter;
00410 
00411 };
00412 
00413 
00420 void EMultipole::Initialize(Topology *top, Property *opt) {
00421 
00422     cout << endl << "... ... Initialize with " << _nThreads << " threads.";
00423     _maverick = (_nThreads == 1) ? true : false;
00424 
00425     cout << endl <<  "... ... Parametrizing Thole model";
00426 
00427     string key;
00428     string xmlfile;
00429 
00430     /* ---- OPTIONS.XML Structure ----
00431      * <emultipole>
00432      *
00433      *      <multipoles></multipoles>
00434      *
00435      *      <control>
00436      *          <induce></induce>
00437      *          <first></first>
00438      *          <last></last>
00439      *          <output></output>
00440      *          <check></check>
00441      *      </control>
00442      *
00443      *      <esp>
00444      *          <calcESP></calcESP>
00445      *          <doSystem></doSystem>
00446      *          <cube></cube>
00447      *          <output></output>
00448      *      <esp>
00449      *
00450      *      <esf>
00451      *          <calcESF></calcESF>
00452      *          <grid></grid>
00453      *          <output></output>
00454      *      <esf>
00455      *
00456      *      <alphamol>
00457      *          <calcAlpha></calcAlpha>
00458      *          <doSystem></doSystem>
00459      *          <output></output>
00460      *      </alphamol>
00461      *
00462      *      <tholeparam>
00463      *          <cutoff></cutoff>
00464      *          <cutoff2></cutoff2>
00465      *          <expdamp></expdamp>
00466      *          <scaling></scaling>
00467      *      </tholeparam>
00468      *
00469      *      <convparam>
00470      *          <wSOR_N></wSOR_N>
00471      *          <wSOR_C></wSOR_C>
00472      *          <maxiter></maxiter>
00473      *          <tolerance></tolerance>
00474      *          <log></log>
00475      *      </convparam>
00476      */
00477 
00478     key = "options.emultipole.multipoles";
00479 
00480         if ( opt->exists(key) ) {
00481             xmlfile = opt->get(key).as< string >();
00482         }
00483 
00484     key = "options.emultipole.control";
00485 
00486         if ( opt->exists(key+".induce") ) {
00487             int induce = opt->get(key+".induce").as< int >();
00488             _induce = (induce == 0) ? false : true;
00489         }
00490         else { _induce = true; }
00491 
00492         if ( opt->exists(key+".first") ) {
00493             _firstSeg = opt->get(key+".first").as< int >();
00494         }
00495         else { _firstSeg = 1; }
00496 
00497         if ( opt->exists(key+".last") ) {
00498             _lastSeg = opt->get(key+".last").as< int >();
00499         }
00500         else { _lastSeg = -1; }
00501 
00502         if ( opt->exists(key+".output") ) {
00503             _outFile = opt->get(key+".output").as< string >();
00504             _energies2File = true;
00505         }
00506         else { _energies2File = false; }
00507 
00508         if ( opt->exists(key+".check") ) {
00509             _checkPolesPDB = opt->get(key+".check").as< string >();
00510         }
00511         else { _checkPolesPDB = ""; }
00512 
00513     key = "options.emultipole.esp";
00514 
00515         if ( opt->exists(key+".calcESP") ) {
00516             int calcESP = opt->get(key+".calcESP").as< int >();
00517             _calcESP = (calcESP == 0) ? false : true;
00518         }
00519         else {
00520             _calcESP = false;
00521         }
00522         if (_calcESP) {
00523             _espCubeFile = opt->get(key+".cube").as< string >();
00524             _espOutFile = opt->get(key+".output").as< string >();
00525             if (opt->exists(key+".doSystem")) {
00526                 int doSystem = opt->get(key+".doSystem").as< int >();
00527                 _ESPdoSystem = (doSystem == 0) ? false : true;
00528             }
00529             else { _ESPdoSystem = false; }
00530         }
00531 
00532     key = "options.emultipole.esf";
00533 
00534         if ( opt->exists(key+".calcESF") ) {
00535             int calcESF = opt->get(key+".calcESF").as< int >();
00536             _calcESF = (calcESF == 0) ? false : true;
00537         }
00538         else {
00539             _calcESF = false;
00540         }
00541         if (_calcESF) {
00542             _esfGridFile = opt->get(key+".grid").as< string >();
00543             _esfOutFile = opt->get(key+".output").as< string >();
00544         }
00545 
00546     key = "options.emultipole.alphamol";
00547 
00548         if ( opt->exists(key+".calcAlpha") ) {
00549             int calcAlpha = opt->get(key+".calcAlpha").as< int >();
00550             _calcAlphaMol = (calcAlpha == 0) ? false : true;
00551         }
00552         if ( opt->exists(key+".doSystem") ) {
00553             int doSystem = opt->get(key+".doSystem").as< int >();
00554             _doSystem = (doSystem == 0) ? false : true;
00555         }
00556         else {
00557             _doSystem = false;
00558         }
00559         if ( opt->exists(key+".output") ) {
00560             string alphaOutFile = opt->get(key+".output").as< string >();
00561             _alphaOutFile = alphaOutFile;
00562         }
00563         else {
00564             _alphaOutFile = "nofile";
00565         }
00566 
00567     key = "options.emultipole.tholeparam";
00568 
00569         if ( opt->exists(key+".cutoff") ) {
00570             _cutoff = opt->get(key+".cutoff").as< double >();
00571             if (_cutoff) { _useCutoff = true; }
00572         }
00573         if ( opt->exists(key+".cutoff2") ) {
00574             _cutoff2 = opt->get(key+".cutoff2").as< double >();
00575         }
00576         else {
00577             _cutoff2 = _cutoff;
00578         }
00579         if ( opt->exists(key+".expdamp") ) {
00580             _aDamp = opt->get(key+".expdamp").as< double >();
00581             if (_aDamp) { _useExp = true; }
00582         }
00583          if ( opt->exists(key+".scaling") ) {
00584             _scale1 = opt->get(key+".scaling").as< vector<double> >();
00585             if (0 < _scale1.size() && _scale1.size() < 4) {
00586                 _useScaling = true; }
00587             else {
00588                 _useScaling = false;
00589                 cout << endl << "... ... WARNING: 1-N SCALING SWITCHED OFF"; }
00590         }
00591 
00592     key = "options.emultipole.convparam";
00593 
00594         if ( opt->exists(key+".wSOR_N") ) {
00595             _wSOR_N = opt->get(key+".wSOR_N").as< float >();
00596         }
00597         else { _wSOR_N = 0.75; }
00598         if ( opt->exists(key+".wSOR_C") ) {
00599             _wSOR_C = opt->get(key+".wSOR_C").as< float >();
00600         }
00601         else { _wSOR_C = 0.75; }
00602 
00603         if ( opt->exists(key+".maxiter") ) {
00604             _maxIter = opt->get(key+".maxiter").as< int >();
00605         }
00606         else { _maxIter = 512; }
00607 
00608         if ( opt->exists(key+".tolerance") ) {
00609             _epsTol = opt->get(key+".tolerance").as< double >();
00610         }
00611         else { _epsTol = 0.001; }
00612 
00613     if (!top->isEStatified()) { this->EStatify(top, opt); }
00614 
00615     if (_calcESP && (!_ESPdoSystem))      { this->CalculateESPInput(top); }
00616     if (this->_calcESF)                   { this->CalculateESF(top); }
00617     if (this->_calcAlphaMol)              { this->CalculateAlphaInput(top); }
00618 }
00619 
00620 
00627 void EMultipole::EStatify(Topology *top, Property *options) {
00628 
00629     cout << endl << "... ... Estatify system: ";
00630 
00631     string key = "options.emultipole";
00632     string allocFile = options->get(key+".multipoles").as<string> ();
00633 
00634     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00635     // Load polar-site indices from XML //
00636     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00637 
00638     // => Output to maps:
00639     map<string, vector<int> > alloc_frag_mpoleIdx;
00640     map<string, vector<string> > alloc_frag_mpoleName;
00641     map<string, string > alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_n;
00642     map<string, string > alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_e;
00643     map<string, string > alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_h;
00644 
00645     Property allocation; // <- Which polar sites are part of which fragment?
00646     load_property_from_xml(allocation, allocFile.c_str());
00647 
00648 
00649     /* --- MULTIPOLES.XML Structure ---
00650      *
00651      * <topology>
00652      *
00653      *     <molecules>
00654      *          <molecule>
00655      *          <name></name>
00656      *
00657      *          <segments>
00658      *
00659      *              <segment>
00660      *              <name>DCV</name>
00661      *
00662      *              <multipoles_n></multipoles_n>
00663      *              <multipoles_e></multipoles_e>
00664      *              <multipoles_h></multipoles_h>
00665      *
00666      *              <map2md></map2md>
00667      *
00668      *              <fragments>
00669      *                  <fragment>
00670      *                  <name></name>
00671      *                  <mpoles></mpoles>
00672      *                  </fragment>
00673      *              </fragments>
00674      *              ...
00675      *              ...
00676      */
00677 
00678 
00679     key = "topology.molecules.molecule";
00680     list<Property *> mols = allocation.Select(key);
00681     list<Property *>::iterator molit;
00682     for (molit = mols.begin(); molit != mols.end(); molit++) {
00683 
00684         string molName = (*molit)->get("name").as<string> ();
00685 
00686         key = "segments.segment";
00687         list<Property *> segs = (*molit)->Select(key);
00688         list<Property *>::iterator segit;
00689 
00690         for (segit = segs.begin(); segit != segs.end(); segit++) {
00691 
00692             string segName = (*segit)->get("name").as<string> ();
00693 
00694             // GDMA filenames for cation (h), neutral (n), anion (e) state
00695             string mpoleFile_n = (*segit)->get("multipoles_n").as<string> ();
00696             alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_n[segName] = mpoleFile_n;
00697             if ( (*segit)->exists("multipoles_e")) {
00698                 string mpoleFile_e = (*segit)->get("multipoles_e").as<string>();
00699                 alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_e[segName] = mpoleFile_e;
00700             }
00701             if ( (*segit)->exists("multipoles_h")) {
00702                 string mpoleFile_h = (*segit)->get("multipoles_h").as<string>();
00703                 alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_h[segName] = mpoleFile_h;
00704             }
00705 
00706             // Default: Project multipoles onto rigidified coordinates
00707             if ( (*segit)->exists("map2md")) {
00708                 int map2md = (*segit)->get("map2md").as<int>();
00709                 _map2md[segName] = (map2md == 0) ? false : true;
00710             }
00711             else {
00712                 _map2md[segName] = false; // i.e. map to rigidified coordinates
00713             }
00714 
00715             key = "fragments.fragment";
00716             list<Property *> frags = (*segit)->Select(key);
00717             list<Property *>::iterator fragit;
00718 
00719             for (fragit = frags.begin(); fragit != frags.end(); fragit++) {
00720 
00721                 string fragName = (*fragit)->get("name").as<string> ();
00722                 string mapKeyName = fragName + segName + molName;
00723 
00724                 string mpoles = (*fragit)->get("mpoles").as<string> ();
00725 
00726                 Tokenizer tokPoles(mpoles, " \t\n");
00727                 vector<string> mpoleInfo;
00728                 tokPoles.ToVector(mpoleInfo);
00729 
00730                 vector<int> mpoleIdcs;
00731                 vector<string> mpoleNames;
00732 
00733                 vector<string> ::iterator strit;
00734                 for (strit=mpoleInfo.begin(); strit<mpoleInfo.end(); strit++) {
00735                     
00736                     Tokenizer tokPoleInfo( (*strit), " :");
00737                     vector<string> poleInfo;
00738                     tokPoleInfo.ToVector(poleInfo);
00739 
00740                     int mpoleIdx = boost::lexical_cast<int>(poleInfo[0]);
00741                     string mpoleName = poleInfo[1];
00742 
00743                     mpoleIdcs.push_back(mpoleIdx);
00744                     mpoleNames.push_back(mpoleName);
00745                     
00746                 }
00747 
00748                 alloc_frag_mpoleIdx[mapKeyName] = mpoleIdcs;
00749                 alloc_frag_mpoleName[mapKeyName] = mpoleNames;
00750             }
00751         }
00752     }
00753 
00754     // ++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00755     // Parse GDMA punch files //
00756     // ++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00757 
00758     // => Output to PolarSite Container (template container)
00759     map<string, vector<PolarSite*> > map_seg_polarSites;
00760     map<string, vector<bool> >       map_seg_chrgStates;
00761 
00762 
00763     // Multipoles for neutral state
00764     int state = 0; 
00765     map<string, string > ::iterator strit;
00766     for (strit = alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_n.begin();
00767          strit != alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_n.end();
00768          strit++) {
00769 
00770         string segName = strit->first;
00771         string filename = strit->second;
00772 
00773         vector< PolarSite* > poles = ParseGdmaFile(filename, state);
00774 
00775         map_seg_polarSites[segName] = poles;
00776         map_seg_chrgStates[segName].resize(3);
00777         map_seg_chrgStates[segName][0] = false; // <- negative
00778         map_seg_chrgStates[segName][1] = true;  // <- neutral
00779         map_seg_chrgStates[segName][2] = false; // <- positive
00780         poles.clear();
00781 
00782     }
00783 
00784     // Multipoles for negative state
00785     state = -1;
00786     if ( alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_e.size() ) {
00787         for (strit = alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_e.begin();
00788              strit != alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_e.end();
00789              strit++) {
00790             string segName = strit->first;
00791             string filename = strit->second;
00792 
00793             vector< PolarSite* > polesAnion = ParseGdmaFile(filename, state);
00794             map_seg_chrgStates[segName][state+1] = true;
00795 
00796             // Merge with polar sites for neutral state
00797             vector< PolarSite* > polesNeutral = map_seg_polarSites[segName];            
00798 
00799             assert(polesAnion.size() == polesNeutral.size());
00800             for (int i = 0; i < polesNeutral.size(); i++) {
00801 
00802                 polesNeutral[i]->setQs( polesAnion[i]->getQs(state), state );
00803                 polesNeutral[i]->setPs( polesAnion[i]->getPs(state), state );
00804                 delete polesAnion[i];
00805             }
00806             polesAnion.clear();
00807         }
00808     }
00809 
00810     // Multipoles for positive state
00811     state = +1;
00812     if ( alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_h.size() ) {
00813         for (strit = alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_h.begin();
00814              strit != alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_h.end();
00815              strit++) {
00816             string segName = strit->first;
00817             string filename = strit->second;
00818 
00819             vector< PolarSite* > polesCation = ParseGdmaFile(filename, state);
00820             map_seg_chrgStates[segName][state+1] = true;
00821 
00822             // Merge with polar sites for neutral state
00823             vector< PolarSite* > polesNeutral = map_seg_polarSites[segName];            
00824 
00825             assert(polesCation.size() == polesNeutral.size());
00826             for (int i = 0; i < polesNeutral.size(); i++) {
00827 
00828                 polesNeutral[i]->setQs( polesCation[i]->getQs(state), state );
00829                 polesNeutral[i]->setPs( polesCation[i]->getPs(state), state );
00830                 delete polesCation[i];
00831             }
00832             polesCation.clear();
00833         }
00834     }
00835 
00836     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00837     // Forward information on polar-site templates to topology //
00838     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00839 
00840     // Containers to use for mapping
00841     // map<string, vector<PolarSite*> >     map_seg_polarSites;
00842     // map<string, vector<int> >            alloc_frag_mpoleIdx;
00843     // map<string, vector<string> >         alloc_frag_mpoleName;
00844     
00845     // TO CONTINUE FROM HERE ...
00846     // Loop over segments, loop over fragments in segments.
00847     // => For each segment, look up associated polar sites using map 1;
00848     //      => For each fragment, look up associated
00849     //         polar sites idcs. using map 2;
00850     //          => For each index in retrieved container, create new polar site,
00851     //             importing information from polar site container of segment
00852     //          => Translate positions to MD frame, copy local frame from
00853     //             fragment
00854 
00855     _map_seg_polarSites = map_seg_polarSites;
00856     _map_seg_chrgStates = map_seg_chrgStates;
00857     _alloc_frag_mpoleIdx =  alloc_frag_mpoleIdx;
00858     _alloc_frag_mpoleName = alloc_frag_mpoleName;
00859     
00860 }
00861 
00862 
00870 vector<PolarSite*> EMultipole::ParseGdmaFile(string filename, int state) {
00871 
00872     int poleCount = 1;
00873     double Q0_total = 0.0;
00874     string units = "";
00875     bool useDefaultPs = true;
00876 
00877     vector<PolarSite*> poles;
00878     PolarSite *thisPole = NULL;
00879 
00880     vector<double> Qs; // <- multipole moments
00881     double         P1; // <- dipole polarizability
00882 
00883     std::string line;
00884     std::ifstream intt;
00885     intt.open(filename.c_str());
00886 
00887     if (intt.is_open() ) {
00888         while ( intt.good() ) {
00889 
00890             std::getline(intt, line);
00891             vector<string> split;
00892             Tokenizer toker(line, " ");
00893             toker.ToVector(split);
00894 
00895             if ( !split.size()      ||
00896                   split[0] == "!"   ||
00897                   split[0].substr(0,1) == "!" ) { continue; }
00898 
00899     // ! Interesting information here, e.g.
00900     // ! DCV2T opt
00901     // ! SP        RB3LYP          6-311+G(d,p)
00902     // Units bohr
00903     //
00904     // C          -4.2414603400   -3.8124751600    0.0017575736    Rank  2
00905     //  -0.3853409355
00906     //  -0.0002321905   0.2401559510   0.6602334308
00907     //  -0.7220625314   0.0004894995  -0.0003833545   0.4526409813  -0.50937399
00908     //  P 1.75
00909 
00910 
00911             // Units used
00912             if ( split[0] == "Units") {
00913                 units = split[1];
00914                 if (units != "bohr" && units != "angstrom") {
00915                     throw std::runtime_error( "Unit " + units + " in file "
00916                                             + filename + " not supported.");
00917                 }
00918             }
00919 
00920             // element,  position,  rank limit
00921             else if ( split.size() == 6 ) {
00922 
00923                 Qs.clear();
00924                 P1 = -1.;
00925 
00926                 int id = poleCount++;  // <- starts from 1
00927                 string name = split[0];
00928 
00929                 double BOHR2NM = 0.0529189379;
00930                 double ANGSTROM2NM = 0.1;
00931                 double x, y, z;
00932 
00933                 if (units == "bohr") {
00934                     x = BOHR2NM * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[1]);
00935                     y = BOHR2NM * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[2]);
00936                     z = BOHR2NM * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[3]);
00937                 }
00938                 else if (units == "angstrom") {
00939                     x = ANGSTROM2NM * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[1]);
00940                     y = ANGSTROM2NM * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[2]);
00941                     z = ANGSTROM2NM * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[3]);
00942                 }
00943                 else {
00944                     throw std::runtime_error( "Unit " + units + " in file "
00945                                             + filename + " not supported.");
00946                 }
00947                 
00948                 vec pos = vec(x,y,z);
00949 
00950                 int rank = boost::lexical_cast<int>(split[5]);
00951 
00952                 PolarSite *newPole = new PolarSite(id, name);
00953                 newPole->setRank(rank);
00954                 newPole->setPos(pos);
00955                 poles.push_back(newPole);
00956                 thisPole = newPole;
00957 
00958             }
00959 
00960             // 'P', dipole polarizability
00961             else if ( split[0] == "P" && split.size() == 2 ) {
00962                 P1 = 1e-3 * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[1]);
00963                 thisPole->setPs(P1, state);
00964                 useDefaultPs = false;
00965             }
00966 
00967             // multipole line
00968             else {
00969 
00970                 int lineRank = int( sqrt(thisPole->getQs(state).size()) + 0.5 );
00971 
00972                 if (lineRank == 0) {
00973                     Q0_total += boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[0]);
00974                 }
00975 
00976                 for (int i = 0; i < split.size(); i++) {
00977 
00978                     double qXYZ = boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[i]);
00979 
00980                     // Convert e*(a_0)^k to e*(nm)^k where k = rank
00981                     double BOHR2NM = 0.0529189379;
00982                     qXYZ *= pow(BOHR2NM, lineRank); // OVERRIDE
00983 
00984                     Qs.push_back(qXYZ);
00985 
00986                 }
00987                 thisPole->setQs(Qs, state);
00988             }
00989 
00990         } /* Exit loop over lines */
00991     }
00992     else { cout << endl << "ERROR: No such file " << filename << endl; }
00993 
00994     cout << endl << "... ... ... Reading " << filename <<
00995                     ": Q0(Total) = " << Q0_total << flush;
00996 
00997     if (useDefaultPs) {
00998 
00999         cout << endl << "... ... ... NOTE Using default Thole polarizabilities "
01000              << "for charge state " << state << ". ";
01001 
01002         vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pol;
01003         for (pol = poles.begin(); pol < poles.end(); ++pol) {
01004             string elem = (*pol)->getName();
01005             double alpha = 0.0;
01006             // Original set of Thole polarizabilites
01007             if      (elem == "C") { alpha = 1.75e-3;  } // <- conversion from
01008             else if (elem == "H") { alpha = 0.696e-3; } //    A³ to nm³ = 10⁻³
01009             else if (elem == "N") { alpha = 1.073e-3; }
01010             else if (elem == "O") { alpha = 0.837e-3; }
01011             else if (elem == "S") { alpha = 2.926e-3; }
01012             // Different set of Thole polarizabilities
01013             //if      (elem == "C") { alpha = 1.334e-3; } // <- conversion from
01014             //else if (elem == "H") { alpha = 0.496e-3; } //    A³ to nm³ = 10⁻³
01015             //else if (elem == "N") { alpha = 1.073e-3; }
01016             //else if (elem == "O") { alpha = 0.837e-3; }
01017             //else if (elem == "S") { alpha = 3.300e-3; }
01018             else { throw runtime_error("No polarizability given "
01019                                        "for polar site type " + elem + ". "); }
01020             (*pol)->setPs(alpha, state);
01021         }
01022     }
01023 
01024     return poles;
01025     
01026 }
01027 
01028 
01033 vector<vec> EMultipole::ParseCubeFileHeader(string filename) {
01034 
01035     vector< vec > cube;
01036     cube.resize(5);
01037 
01038     //               STRUCTURE CUBE CONTAINER
01039     //       0        1         2         3         4
01040     //  |         |         |         |         |         |
01041     //   ox oy oz  Nx Ny Nz  xx xy xz  yx yy yz  zx zy zz
01042 
01043     std::string line;
01044     int lineCount = 0;
01045 
01046     double Nx = 0;
01047     double Ny = 0;
01048     double Nz = 0;
01049     double BOHR2NM = 0.0529189379;
01050     double ANGSTROM2NM = 0.1;
01051     double ext2nm = BOHR2NM;
01052 
01053     std::ifstream intt;
01054     intt.open(filename.c_str());
01055 
01056     if (intt.is_open()) {
01057         while (intt.good()) {
01058 
01059             ++lineCount;
01060 
01061             std::getline(intt, line);
01062             vector<string> split;
01063             Tokenizer toker(line, " ");
01064             toker.ToVector(split);
01065 
01066             // First two lines are comment lines
01067             if (lineCount == 1 || lineCount == 2) { continue; }            
01068 
01069 
01070 
01071             // Skip empty lines
01072             if ( split.size() == 0) { continue; }
01073 
01074             // => Interesting information here
01075             if (lineCount == 3) {
01076 
01077                 assert( split.size() == 4 );
01078                 double ox = boost::lexical_cast<double>( split[1] );
01079                 double oy = boost::lexical_cast<double>( split[2] );
01080                 double oz = boost::lexical_cast<double>( split[3] );
01081 
01082                 cube[0] = vec(ox, oy, oz);
01083             }
01084 
01085             /*
01086             STRUCTURE SAMPLE CPMD CUBE FILE
01087             OUTER LOOP: X, MIDDLE LOOP: Y, INNER LOOP: Z
01088               3    0.000000    0.000000    0.000000
01089              40    0.283459    0.000000    0.000000
01090              40    0.000000    0.283459    0.000000
01091              40    0.000000    0.000000    0.283459
01092               8    0.000000    5.570575    5.669178    5.593517
01093               1    0.000000    5.562867    5.669178    7.428055
01094               1    0.000000    7.340606    5.669178    5.111259
01095               :             :          :           :            :            :
01096               :             :          :           :            :            :
01097               :             :          :           :            :            :
01098                 In this case there will be 40 x 40 x 40 floating point values
01099               :             :          :           :            :            :
01100               :             :          :           :            :            :
01101               :             :          :           :            :            :
01102             */
01103 
01104             if (lineCount == 4) {
01105 
01106                 assert( split.size() == 4 );
01107                 Nx = boost::lexical_cast<double>( split[0] );
01108                 ext2nm = (Nx > 0) ? BOHR2NM : ANGSTROM2NM;
01109                 Nx = (Nx >= 0) ? Nx : -Nx;
01110                 double xx = ext2nm * boost::lexical_cast<double>( split[1] );
01111                 double xy = ext2nm * boost::lexical_cast<double>( split[2] );
01112                 double xz = ext2nm * boost::lexical_cast<double>( split[3] );
01113 
01114                 cube[2] = vec(xx, xy, xz);                
01115             }
01116 
01117             if (lineCount == 5) {
01118 
01119                 assert( split.size() == 4 );
01120                 Ny = boost::lexical_cast<double>( split[0] );
01121                 ext2nm = (Ny > 0) ? BOHR2NM : ANGSTROM2NM;
01122                 Ny = (Ny >= 0) ? Ny : -Ny;
01123                 double yx = ext2nm * boost::lexical_cast<double>( split[1] );
01124                 double yy = ext2nm * boost::lexical_cast<double>( split[2] );
01125                 double yz = ext2nm * boost::lexical_cast<double>( split[3] );
01126 
01127                 cube[3] = vec(yx, yy, yz);
01128             }
01129 
01130             if (lineCount == 6) {
01131 
01132                 assert( split.size() == 4 );
01133                 Nz = boost::lexical_cast<double>( split[0] );
01134                 ext2nm = (Nz > 0) ? BOHR2NM : ANGSTROM2NM;
01135                 Nz = (Nz >= 0) ? Nz : -Nz;
01136                 double zx = ext2nm * boost::lexical_cast<double>( split[1] );
01137                 double zy = ext2nm * boost::lexical_cast<double>( split[2] );
01138                 double zz = ext2nm * boost::lexical_cast<double>( split[3] );
01139 
01140                 cube[4] = vec(zx, zy, zz);
01141                 cube[1] = vec(Nx, Ny, Nz);
01142             }
01143 
01144             // Header at finish?
01145             if (lineCount > 6) {
01146                 break;
01147             }
01148         }
01149     }
01150     else { cout << endl << "ERROR: No such file " << filename << endl; }
01151 
01152     // Convert origin
01153     cube[0] *= ext2nm;
01154 
01155     return cube;
01156 }
01157 
01158 
01164 void EMultipole::CalculateESPInput(Topology *top) {
01165 
01166     cout << endl << "... ... Calculating ESP";
01167 
01168     // Load grid from cube file
01169     _cube = ParseCubeFileHeader(_espCubeFile);
01170 
01171     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01172     // Iterate over segment types (in GDMA config) //
01173     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01174     
01175     map< string, vector< PolarSite* > >::iterator sit;
01176     for (sit = this->_map_seg_polarSites.begin();
01177          sit != this->_map_seg_polarSites.end();
01178          ++sit) {
01179 
01180         cout << endl << "... ... ... ESP for segment type " << sit->first
01181              << flush;
01182 
01183         vector< PolarSite* > poles = sit->second;
01184         vector< PolarSite* >::iterator pit;
01185 
01186         // Translate CoM to origin
01187         vec CoM = vec(0.,0.,0.);
01188         int N = poles.size();
01189         for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
01190             CoM += (*pit)->getPos();
01191         }
01192         CoM /= N;
01193         for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
01194             vec newpos = (*pit)->getPos() - CoM;
01195             (*pit)->setPos( newpos );
01196         }
01197 
01198         for (int state = -1; state < 2; ++state) {
01199 
01200             // Multipole data for this state?
01201             bool hasState = _map_seg_chrgStates[sit->first][state+1];
01202             if (!hasState) { continue; }
01203 
01204             // Charge container appropriately
01205             for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
01206                 (*pit)->Depolarize();
01207                 (*pit)->Charge(state);
01208             }
01209 
01210             // Prepare cube file, for structure sample see cube-file parser
01211             FILE *out;
01212             string espOutFile =  sit->first
01213                             + "_" + boost::lexical_cast<string>(state)
01214                             + "_" + _espOutFile;
01215             out = fopen(espOutFile.c_str(), "w");
01216 
01217             fprintf(out, "CUBE FILE GENERATED BY VOTCA CTP \n");
01218             fprintf(out, "ESP %4s CHARGE %1d \n", (sit->first).c_str(), state);
01219 
01220             cout << endl << "... ... ... ... State " << state << ": " << flush;
01221 
01222             this->CalculateESP(poles, out);
01223 
01224             fclose(out);
01225         }
01226     }
01227 }
01228 
01229 
01235 void EMultipole::CalculateESPRigid(Topology *top) {
01236 
01237     cout << endl << "... ... Calculate ESP for segment ID: " << flush;
01238 
01239     // Cube volumetric grid
01240     _cube = ParseCubeFileHeader(_espCubeFile);
01241 
01242     int segId;
01243     cin >> segId;
01244 
01245     Segment *seg = top->getSegment(segId);
01246 
01247     cout << "... ... ... Selected segment type " << seg->getName() << flush;
01248 
01249     vector< PolarSite* > poles = seg->PolarSites();
01250     vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit;
01251 
01252     // Translate CoM to origin
01253     vec CoM = vec(0.,0.,0.);
01254     int N = poles.size();
01255     for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
01256         CoM += (*pit)->getPos();
01257     }
01258     CoM /= N;
01259     for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
01260         vec newpos = (*pit)->getPos() - CoM;
01261         (*pit)->setPos( newpos );
01262     }
01263     
01264     // Investigate charge states
01265     for (int state = -1; state < 2; ++state) {
01266         bool hasState = _map_seg_chrgStates[seg->getName()][state+1];
01267         if (!hasState) { continue; }
01268 
01269         for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
01270             (*pit)->Charge(state);
01271         }
01272 
01273         FILE *out;
01274         string espOutFile = seg->getName()
01275                         + "_ID" + boost::lexical_cast<string>(seg->getId())
01276                         + "_" + boost::lexical_cast<string>(state)
01277                         + "_" + _espOutFile;
01278         out = fopen(espOutFile.c_str(), "w");
01279 
01280         fprintf(out, "CUBE FILE GENERATED BY VOTCA CTP \n");
01281         fprintf(out, "ESP %4s ID %4d CHARGE %1d \n", 
01282                       seg->getName().c_str(), seg->getId(), state);
01283 
01284         cout << endl << "... ... ... State " << state << ": " << flush;
01285 
01286         this->CalculateESP(poles, out);
01287 
01288         fclose(out);
01289     }
01290 }
01291 
01292 
01298 void EMultipole::CalculateESP(vector< PolarSite* > &poles, FILE *out) {
01299 
01300     // Calculate potential for each voxel, write to output on the fly
01301     Interactor actor = Interactor(NULL, this);
01302     vector< PolarSite* >::iterator pit;
01303 
01304     vec Cxyz = _cube[0];
01305 
01306     vec C0 = _cube[0];
01307     vec Cx = _cube[2];
01308     vec Cy = _cube[3];
01309     vec Cz = _cube[4];
01310 
01311     int Nx = int(_cube[1].getX() + 0.5);
01312     int Ny = int(_cube[1].getY() + 0.5);
01313     int Nz = int(_cube[1].getZ() + 0.5);
01314 
01315 
01316     // Prepare cube file: Header
01317     double NM2BOHR = 1 / 0.0529189379;
01318     fprintf(out, "%5d %3.7f %3.7f %3.7f \n",
01319                   poles.size(),
01320                   Cxyz.getX()*NM2BOHR,
01321                   Cxyz.getY()*NM2BOHR,
01322                   Cxyz.getZ()*NM2BOHR);
01323     fprintf(out, "%5d %3.7f %3.7f %3.7f \n",
01324                   Nx,
01325                   Cx.getX()*NM2BOHR,
01326                   Cx.getY()*NM2BOHR,
01327                   Cx.getZ()*NM2BOHR);
01328     fprintf(out, "%5d %3.7f %3.7f %3.7f \n",
01329                   Ny,
01330                   Cy.getX()*NM2BOHR,
01331                   Cy.getY()*NM2BOHR,
01332                   Cy.getZ()*NM2BOHR);
01333     fprintf(out, "%5d %3.7f %3.7f %3.7f \n",
01334                   Nz,
01335                   Cz.getX()*NM2BOHR,
01336                   Cz.getY()*NM2BOHR,
01337                   Cz.getZ()*NM2BOHR);
01338     for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
01339 
01340         string elem = (*pit)->_name;
01341         int Z = 0;
01342         if      (elem == "C") { Z = 6; }
01343         else if (elem == "H") { Z = 1; }
01344         else if (elem == "N") { Z = 7; }
01345         else if (elem == "O") { Z = 8; }
01346         else if (elem == "S") { Z = 16; }
01347 
01348         fprintf(out, "%5d %3.7f %3.7f %3.7f %3.7f \n",
01349                 Z,
01350                 0.000,
01351                 (*pit)->getPos().getX() * NM2BOHR,
01352                 (*pit)->getPos().getY() * NM2BOHR,
01353                 (*pit)->getPos().getZ() * NM2BOHR);
01354     }
01355 
01356     int phiCount = 0;
01357     double int2V = 1/(4*M_PI*8.854187817e-12) * 1.602176487e-19 / 1.000e-9;
01358 
01359     for (int i = 0; i < Nx; ++i) {
01360         for (int j = 0; j < Ny; ++j) {
01361             for ( int k = 0; k < Nz; ++k) {
01362 
01363                 Cxyz = C0 + i*Cx + j*Cy + k*Cz;
01364 
01365                 double phi = 0.0;
01366                 ++phiCount;
01367 
01368                 for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
01369                     phi += actor.PotentialPerm(Cxyz, *(*pit));
01370                 }
01371 
01372                 fprintf(out, " %1.7E", phi * int2V);
01373                 if ( (phiCount % 6) == 0 ) {
01374                     fprintf(out, " \n");
01375                     phiCount = 0;
01376                 }
01377             }
01378         }
01379     }
01380     
01381     cout << " Calculated potential at " << Nx*Ny*Nz
01382          << " grid points. " << flush;
01383 
01384     // Calculate self-energy of configuration (just out of interest)
01385     double E = 0.0;
01386     vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit2;
01387     for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
01388         for (pit2 = pit + 1; pit2 < poles.end(); ++pit2) {
01389             E += actor.EnergyInterESP(*(*pit), *(*pit2));            
01390         }
01391     }
01392     double E2eV = 1.602176487e-19 * 1e9 * 1/(4*M_PI*8.854187817e-12);
01393     cout << endl << "... ... ... ... "
01394          << "Electrostatic self-energy of configuration: "
01395          << E*E2eV << " eV. ";
01396     
01397 }
01398 
01399 
01405 void EMultipole::CalculateESF(Topology *top) {
01406 
01407     cout << endl << "... ... Calculating ESF";
01408 
01409     double int2N_C = 1/(4*M_PI*8.854187817e-12) * 1.602176487e-19 * 1.000e-18;
01410 
01411     // +++++++++++++++++++ //
01412     // Load grid from file //
01413     // +++++++++++++++++++ //
01414 
01415     vector<vec> gridPoints;
01416     double CONVERT2NM = 1;
01417 
01418     std::string line;
01419     std::ifstream intt;
01420     intt.open(this->_esfGridFile.c_str());
01421 
01422     if (intt.is_open() ) {
01423 
01424         while ( intt.good() ) {
01425 
01426 
01427             std::getline(intt, line);
01428             vector<string> split;
01429             Tokenizer toker(line, " ");
01430             toker.ToVector(split);
01431 
01432             if ( !split.size()      ||
01433                   split[0] == "!"   ||
01434                   split[0].substr(0,1) == "!" ) { continue; }
01435 
01436             // ! Interesting information here, e.g.
01437             // Units bohr
01438 
01439             //  -0.3853409355   0.0004894995  -0.0003833545
01440             //  -0.0002321905   0.2401559510   0.6602334308
01441             // ! ...
01442 
01443             // Units used
01444             if ( split[0] == "Units") {
01445                 string units = split[1];
01446 
01447                 if      (units == "bohr") { CONVERT2NM = 0.0529189379; }
01448                 else if (units == "nm") { CONVERT2NM = 1.; }
01449                 else if (units == "A") { CONVERT2NM = 0.1; }
01450                 else {
01451                     throw std::runtime_error( "Unit " + units + " in file "
01452                                             + _esfGridFile + " not supported.");
01453                 }
01454             }
01455 
01456             else {
01457 
01458                 double x = CONVERT2NM * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[0]);
01459                 double y = CONVERT2NM * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[1]);
01460                 double z = CONVERT2NM * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[2]);
01461 
01462                 gridPoints.push_back(vec(x,y,z));
01463             }
01464         }
01465     }
01466     else { cout << endl << "ERROR: No such file " << _esfGridFile << endl; }
01467 
01468     this->_esfGrid = gridPoints;
01469 
01470     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01471     // Iterate over segment types (in GDMA config) //
01472     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01473 
01474     map< string, vector< PolarSite* > >::iterator sit;
01475     for (sit = this->_map_seg_polarSites.begin();
01476          sit != this->_map_seg_polarSites.end();
01477          ++sit) {
01478 
01479         cout << endl << "... ... ... ESF for segment " << sit->first << flush;
01480 
01481 
01482 
01483         vector< PolarSite* > poles = sit->second;
01484         vector< PolarSite* >::iterator pit;
01485 
01486         for (int state = -1; state < 2; ++state) {
01487 
01488             // Multipole data for this state?
01489             bool hasState = _map_seg_chrgStates[sit->first][state+1];
01490             if (!hasState) { continue; }
01491 
01492             // Store the field
01493             vector< vec > gridPointESF;
01494 
01495             // Charge container appropriately
01496             for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
01497                 (*pit)->Charge(state);
01498             }
01499 
01500             // Calculate field for each grid point, store in gridPointESF
01501             Interactor actor = Interactor(top, this);
01502 
01503             vector< vec >::iterator grit;
01504             for (grit = _esfGrid.begin(); grit < _esfGrid.end(); ++grit) {
01505 
01506                 vec F = vec(0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
01507 
01508                 for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
01509                     F += actor.FieldPermESF((*grit), *(*pit));
01510                 }
01511                 gridPointESF.push_back(F);
01512             }
01513 
01514             cout << endl << "... ... ... ... State " << state << ": "
01515                          << " Calculated field at " << gridPointESF.size()
01516                          << " grid points. " << flush;
01517 
01518 
01519             // Write to file
01520             FILE *out;
01521             string esfOutFile =  sit->first
01522                             + "_" + boost::lexical_cast<string>(state)
01523                             + "_" + _esfOutFile;
01524 
01525             out = fopen(esfOutFile.c_str(), "w");
01526 
01527             assert(_esfGrid.size() == gridPointESF.size());
01528             int g = 0;
01529             int p = 0;
01530             for ( ; p < gridPointESF.size(); ++g, ++p) {
01531 
01532                 fprintf(out, " %3.8f %3.8f %3.8f   %3.8f %3.8f %3.8f \n",
01533                         _esfGrid[g].getX(),
01534                         _esfGrid[g].getY(),
01535                         _esfGrid[g].getZ(),
01536                         gridPointESF[p].getX(),
01537                         gridPointESF[p].getY(),
01538                         gridPointESF[p].getZ() );
01539             }
01540         }
01541     }
01542 }
01543 
01544 
01549 void EMultipole::CalculateAlphaInput(Topology *top) {
01550 
01551     cout << endl << "... ... Calculating site polarizabilities";
01552 
01553     map< string, vector< PolarSite* > >::iterator sit;
01554     for (sit = _map_seg_polarSites.begin();
01555          sit != _map_seg_polarSites.end();
01556          ++sit) {
01557 
01558         cout << endl << "... ... ... Polarizability for segment "
01559              << sit->first << flush;
01560 
01561         FILE *out;
01562         string alphaOutFile = sit->first + "_" + _alphaOutFile;
01563         out = fopen(alphaOutFile.c_str(), "w");
01564 
01565         vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit;
01566 
01567         // Neutral state
01568         int state = 0;
01569         if (_map_seg_chrgStates[sit->first][state+1]) {
01570 
01571             for (pit = sit->second.begin(); pit < sit->second.end(); ++pit) {
01572                 (*pit)->Charge(state);
01573             }
01574             
01575             cout << endl << "... ... ... ... NEUTRAL " << state;
01576             fprintf(out, "[ NEUTRAL ] \n");
01577             this->CalculateAlphaRigid(sit->second, out, false);
01578         }
01579 
01580         // Cationic state
01581         state = +1;        
01582         if (_map_seg_chrgStates[sit->first][state+1]) {
01583 
01584             for (pit = sit->second.begin(); pit < sit->second.end(); ++pit) {
01585                 (*pit)->Charge(state);
01586             }
01587 
01588             cout << endl << "... ... ... ... CATION " << state;
01589             fprintf(out, "\n\n[ CATION ] \n");
01590             this->CalculateAlphaRigid(sit->second, out, false);
01591         }
01592 
01593         // Anionic state
01594         state = -1;
01595         if (_map_seg_chrgStates[sit->first][state+1]) {
01596 
01597             for (pit = sit->second.begin(); pit < sit->second.end(); ++pit) {
01598                 (*pit)->Charge(state);
01599             }
01600 
01601             cout << endl << "... ... ... ... ANION " << state;
01602             fprintf(out, "\n\n[ ANION ] \n");
01603             this->CalculateAlphaRigid(sit->second, out, false);
01604         }
01605 
01606         // Not necessary, still: Charge back to neutral state
01607         for (pit = sit->second.begin(); pit < sit->second.end(); ++pit) {
01608                 (*pit)->Charge(0);
01609         }
01610 
01611     }
01612 }
01613 
01614 
01618 void EMultipole::CalculateAlphaRigid(vector< PolarSite* > &poles,
01619                                       FILE *out, bool system) {
01620 
01621     vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit;
01622 
01623     double axx, axy, axz;             // |
01624     double ayx, ayy, ayz;             // |-> Polarizability tensor
01625     double azx, azy, azz;             // |
01626 
01627     double siteU1x, siteU1y, siteU1z; // |-> Molecular ind. dipole
01628 
01629     double extFx, extFy, extFz;       // |-> External applied field
01630 
01631     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01632     // External field in x-direction //
01633     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01634 
01635     siteU1x = siteU1y = siteU1z = 0.0;
01636 
01637     extFx = 0.1;
01638     extFy = 0.0;
01639     extFz = 0.0;
01640 
01641     // Set permanent field
01642     for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
01643         (*pit)->FPx = extFx;
01644         (*pit)->FPy = extFy;
01645         (*pit)->FPz = extFz;
01646     }
01647 
01648     // Calculate induction field
01649     this->SiteAlphaInduce(NULL, poles);
01650 
01651     // Add up ind. dpl.s to yield molecular U1
01652     for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
01653         siteU1x += (*pit)->U1x;
01654         siteU1y += (*pit)->U1y;
01655         siteU1z += (*pit)->U1z;
01656     }
01657 
01658     // Calculate associated column of polarizability tensor
01659     axx = - siteU1x / extFx;
01660     ayx = - siteU1y / extFx;
01661     azx = - siteU1z / extFx;
01662 
01663     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01664     // External field in y-direction //
01665     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01666 
01667     siteU1x = siteU1y = siteU1z = 0.0;
01668 
01669     extFx = 0.0;
01670     extFy = 0.1;
01671     extFz = 0.0;
01672 
01673     // Set permanent field
01674     for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
01675         (*pit)->FPx = extFx;
01676         (*pit)->FPy = extFy;
01677         (*pit)->FPz = extFz;
01678     }
01679 
01680     // Calculate induction field
01681     this->SiteAlphaInduce(NULL, poles);
01682 
01683     // Add up ind. dpl.s to yield molecular U1
01684     for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
01685         siteU1x += (*pit)->U1x;
01686         siteU1y += (*pit)->U1y;
01687         siteU1z += (*pit)->U1z;
01688     }
01689 
01690     // Calculate associated column of polarizability tensor
01691     axy = - siteU1x / extFy;
01692     ayy = - siteU1y / extFy;
01693     azy = - siteU1z / extFy;
01694 
01695     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01696     // External field in z-direction //
01697     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01698 
01699     siteU1x = siteU1y = siteU1z = 0.0;
01700 
01701     extFx = 0.0;
01702     extFy = 0.0;
01703     extFz = 0.1;
01704 
01705     // Set permanent field
01706     for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
01707         (*pit)->FPx = extFx;
01708         (*pit)->FPy = extFy;
01709         (*pit)->FPz = extFz;
01710     }
01711 
01712     // Calculate induction field
01713     this->SiteAlphaInduce(NULL, poles);
01714 
01715     // Add up ind. dpl.s to yield molecular U1
01716     for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
01717         siteU1x += (*pit)->U1x;
01718         siteU1y += (*pit)->U1y;
01719         siteU1z += (*pit)->U1z;
01720     }
01721 
01722     // Calculate associated column of polarizability tensor
01723     axz = - siteU1x / extFz;
01724     ayz = - siteU1y / extFz;
01725     azz = - siteU1z / extFz;
01726 
01727     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01728     // Sum, Trace, Diagonalization //
01729     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01730 
01731     // Sum over atomic polarizabilities
01732     double SUM_alpha = 0.0;
01733     for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
01734         SUM_alpha += (*pit)->P1;
01735     }
01736 
01737     double NM3_2_A3 = 1000.;
01738     SUM_alpha *= NM3_2_A3;
01739 
01740     // TODO Diagonalize polarizability tensor
01741     // For now, trace is enough
01742     double ISO_alpha = (axx + ayy + azz) / 3.;
01743 
01744     ISO_alpha *= NM3_2_A3;
01745 
01746     // Eigenvalues of polarizability tensor
01747     matrix alpha = matrix( vec(axx,ayx,azx),
01748                            vec(axy,ayy,azy),
01749                            vec(axz,ayz,azz) );
01750     matrix::eigensystem_t EIGEN;
01751     alpha.SolveEigensystem(EIGEN);
01752 
01753 
01754     if (! system) {
01755         cout << endl << "... ... ... ... Sum over atomic alphas:    "
01756              << SUM_alpha << " A**3.";
01757         cout << endl << "... ... ... ... 1/3 trace of alpha tensor: "
01758              << ISO_alpha << " A**3.";
01759         cout << endl << "... ... ... ... Eigenvalues: "
01760              << EIGEN.eigenvalues[0]*NM3_2_A3 << " A**3, "
01761              << EIGEN.eigenvalues[1]*NM3_2_A3 << " A**3, "
01762              << EIGEN.eigenvalues[2]*NM3_2_A3 << " A**3. ";
01763     }
01764 
01765     if (_alphaOutFile != "noname" && _alphaOutFile != "") {
01766 
01767         vec x = EIGEN.eigenvecs[0];
01768         vec y = EIGEN.eigenvecs[1];
01769         vec z = EIGEN.eigenvecs[2];
01770 
01771         if (! system) {
01772             fprintf(out, "Polarizability tensor in global frame \n");
01773             fprintf(out, "%4.7f  %4.7f  %4.7f \n", axx*NM3_2_A3, axy*NM3_2_A3, axz*NM3_2_A3);
01774             fprintf(out, "%4.7f  %4.7f  %4.7f \n", ayx*NM3_2_A3, ayy*NM3_2_A3, ayz*NM3_2_A3);
01775             fprintf(out, "%4.7f  %4.7f  %4.7f \n", azx*NM3_2_A3, azy*NM3_2_A3, azz*NM3_2_A3);
01776             fprintf(out, "\n");
01777             fprintf(out, "Polarizability tensor in eigenframe \n");
01778             fprintf(out, "%4.7f  %4.7f  %4.7f \n", EIGEN.eigenvalues[0]*NM3_2_A3,0.,0.);
01779             fprintf(out, "%4.7f  %4.7f  %4.7f \n", 0.,EIGEN.eigenvalues[1]*NM3_2_A3,0.);
01780             fprintf(out, "%4.7f  %4.7f  %4.7f \n", 0.,0.,EIGEN.eigenvalues[2]*NM3_2_A3);
01781             fprintf(out, "\n");
01782             fprintf(out, "Polarizability tensor main axes \n");
01783             fprintf(out, "%4.7f  %4.7f  %4.7f \n", x.getX(),x.getY(),x.getZ());
01784             fprintf(out, "%4.7f  %4.7f  %4.7f \n", y.getX(),y.getY(),y.getZ());
01785             fprintf(out, "%4.7f  %4.7f  %4.7f \n", z.getX(),z.getY(),z.getZ());
01786         }
01787         else {
01788             fprintf(out, "%4.7f  %4.7f  %4.7f  %4.7f  %4.7f ",
01789                          ISO_alpha, SUM_alpha,
01790                          EIGEN.eigenvalues[0]*NM3_2_A3,
01791                          EIGEN.eigenvalues[1]*NM3_2_A3,
01792                          EIGEN.eigenvalues[2]*NM3_2_A3);
01793         }
01794     }
01795 }
01796 
01797 
01802 void EMultipole::SiteAlphaInduce(Topology *top, vector<PolarSite*> &poles) {
01803 
01804     int    maxIter = this->_maxIter;
01805     double wSOR = this->_wSOR_N;
01806     double eTOL = this->_epsTol;
01807 
01808     vector< PolarSite* >::iterator pit1;
01809     vector< PolarSite* >::iterator pit2;
01810 
01811     Interactor actor = Interactor(top, this);
01812 
01813     // Induce to first order
01814     for (pit1 = poles.begin(); pit1 < poles.end(); ++pit1) {
01815         (*pit1)->InduceDirect();
01816     }
01817 
01818 
01819     int iter = 0;
01820     for ( ; iter < maxIter; ++iter) {
01821 
01822         // Reset induction field
01823         for (pit1 = poles.begin(); pit1 < poles.end(); ++pit1) {
01824             (*pit1)->ResetFieldU();
01825         }
01826 
01827         // Calculate higher-order induction field
01828         for (pit1 = poles.begin(); pit1 < poles.end(); ++pit1) {
01829             for (pit2 = pit1 + 1; pit2 < poles.end(); ++pit2) {
01830                 actor.FieldInduAlpha(*(*pit1),*(*pit2));
01831             }
01832         }
01833 
01834         // Induce dipoles
01835         for (pit1 = poles.begin(); pit1 < poles.end(); ++pit1) {
01836             (*pit1)->Induce(wSOR);
01837         }
01838 
01839         // Check for convergence
01840         bool converged = true;
01841         double maxdU = -1;
01842         double avgdU = 0.0;
01843         int    baseN = 0;
01844 
01845         for (pit1 = poles.begin(); pit1 < poles.end(); ++pit1) {
01846              double dU = (*pit1)->HistdU();
01847              avgdU += dU;
01848              ++baseN;
01849              if ( dU > maxdU ) { maxdU = dU; }
01850              if ( dU > eTOL ) { converged = false; }
01851         }
01852 
01853         avgdU /= baseN;
01854         if (avgdU < eTOL/10.) { converged = true; }
01855 
01856         //cout << endl << "ITER" << iter << " | MAX dU " << maxdU
01857         //     << " | AVG dU " << avgdU;
01858 
01859         // Break if converged
01860         if (converged) { break; }
01861         else if (iter == maxIter - 1) {
01862             cout << endl << "... ... ... "
01863                  << "WARNING Induced multipoles did not converge to precision: "
01864                  << " AVG dU:U " << avgdU << flush;
01865             break;
01866         }
01867     }
01868 }
01869 
01870 
01877 void EMultipole::DistributeMpoles(Topology *top) {
01878 
01879     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01880     // Equip TOP with distributed multipoles //
01881     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01882 
01883     vector<Segment*> ::iterator sit;
01884     for (sit = top->Segments().begin();
01885          sit < top->Segments().end();
01886          ++sit) {
01887 
01888         Segment *seg = *sit;
01889         vector<PolarSite*> poleSites = _map_seg_polarSites.at(seg->getName());
01890         seg->setChrgStates(_map_seg_chrgStates[seg->getName()]);
01891 
01892         bool map2md = _map2md[seg->getName()];
01893 
01894         vector<Fragment*> ::iterator fit;
01895         for (fit = seg->Fragments().begin();
01896              fit < seg->Fragments().end();
01897              ++fit) {
01898             
01899             Fragment *frag = *fit;
01900 
01901             string idkey = frag->getName() + seg->getName()
01902                          + seg->getMolecule()->getName();
01903             vector<int> polesInFrag = _alloc_frag_mpoleIdx.at(idkey);
01904             vector<string> namesInFrag = _alloc_frag_mpoleName.at(idkey);
01905 
01906             if (map2md) {
01907                 if (polesInFrag.size() != frag->Atoms().size()) {
01908                     cout << endl << "ERROR: Segment " << seg->getName() <<
01909                             " Fragment " << frag->getName() <<
01910                             ": MAP2MD = TRUE requires same number of polar sites "
01911                             " as there are atoms to perform mapping. " << endl;
01912                     throw runtime_error("User not paying attention. ");
01913                 }
01914             }
01915 
01916 
01917             for (int i = 0; i < polesInFrag.size(); i++) {
01918 
01919                 string name = namesInFrag[i];
01920                 int poleId = polesInFrag[i];
01921 
01922                 PolarSite *templ = poleSites[poleId-1];
01923                 PolarSite *newSite = top->AddPolarSite(name);
01924                 newSite->ImportFrom(templ);
01925                 seg->AddPolarSite(newSite);
01926                 frag->AddPolarSite(newSite);
01927 
01928                 // Shift + rotate
01929                 if (!map2md) {
01930                     newSite->Translate(frag->getTransQM2MD());
01931                     newSite->Rotate(frag->getRotQM2MD(), frag->getCoMD());
01932                 }
01933                 else {
01934                     vec mdpos = frag->Atoms()[i]->getPos();
01935                     newSite->setPos(mdpos);
01936                     if (newSite->getRank() > 0) {
01937                         cout << endl << "ERROR: MAP2MD = TRUE "
01938                         " prevents use of higher-rank multipoles. " << endl;
01939                         throw runtime_error("User not paying attention. ");
01940                     }
01941                 }
01942             }
01943         }
01944     }
01945 
01946     top->setIsEStatified(true);
01947 
01948 }
01949 
01950 
01957 bool EMultipole::EvaluateFrame(Topology *top) {
01958 
01959     // ++++++++++++++++++++ //
01960     // Ridigidfy + Estatify //
01961     // ++++++++++++++++++++ //
01962 
01963     // Rigidify if (a) not rigid yet (b) rigidification at all possible
01964     if (!top->isRigid()) {
01965         bool isRigid = top->Rigidify();
01966         if (!isRigid) { return 0; }
01967     }
01968     else { cout << endl << "... ... System is already rigidified."; }
01969 
01970     // Forward multipoles to topology
01971     if (top->isEStatified() == false) {
01972         this->DistributeMpoles(top);
01973         cout << endl << "... ... Created " << top->PolarSites().size()
01974                  << " multipole sites." << flush;
01975     }
01976     else { cout << endl << "... ... System is already estatified."; }
01977 
01978     if (_checkPolesPDB != "") {
01979         cout << endl << "... ... Writing polar-site coordinates to "
01980              << _checkPolesPDB << ". " << flush;
01981         // To check rotation into global frame
01982         string mpNAME = _checkPolesPDB;
01983         FILE *mpPDB = NULL;
01984         mpPDB = fopen(mpNAME.c_str(), "w");
01985         vector<Segment*>::iterator sit;
01986         for (sit = top->Segments().begin();
01987              sit < top->Segments().end();
01988              ++sit) {
01989             (*sit)->WritePDB(mpPDB, "Multipoles", "MD");
01990         }
01991         fclose(mpPDB);
01992     }
01993 
01994     if (_calcESP && _ESPdoSystem) {
01995         this->CalculateESPRigid(top);
01996     }
01997 
01998     // What has already been done? If anything at all, return 0.
01999     if ( (_calcAlphaMol && !_doSystem) || _calcESP || _calcESF) {
02000 
02001         cout << endl << "... ... Calculated ";
02002 
02003         if (this->_calcAlphaMol) {
02004             cout << "site polarizability tensors, ";
02005         }
02006         if (this->_calcESP) {
02007             cout << "ESPs, ";
02008         }
02009         if (this->_calcESF) {
02010             cout << "ESFs, ";
02011         }
02012         cout << "return. ";
02013         return 0;
02014     }
02015 
02016     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
02017     // Polarizabilities for all sites in system //
02018     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
02019 
02020     if (_calcAlphaMol && _doSystem) {
02021 
02022         cout << endl << "... ... Calculating site polarizabilities" << endl;
02023 
02024         FILE *out;
02025         string alphaOutFile =
02026                 "Frame" + boost::lexical_cast<string>(top->getDatabaseId())
02027                 + "_" + _alphaOutFile;
02028         out = fopen(alphaOutFile.c_str(), "w");
02029 
02030         vector< Segment* > ::iterator sit;
02031         vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit;
02032         for (sit = top->Segments().begin();
02033              sit < top->Segments().end();
02034              ++sit) {
02035 
02036             vector< PolarSite* > poles = (*sit)->PolarSites();
02037 
02038 
02039             cout << "\r... ... ... Segment " << (*sit)->getId() << " " << flush;
02040 
02041             fprintf(out, "%4d %4s ", (*sit)->getId(),(*sit)->getName().c_str());
02042 
02043             int state = 0;
02044             if ( (*sit)->hasChrgState(state) ) {
02045                 fprintf(out, "N ");
02046                 for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
02047                     (*pit)->Charge(state);
02048                 }
02049                 this->CalculateAlphaRigid(poles, out, true);
02050             }
02051 
02052             state = -1;
02053             if ( (*sit)->hasChrgState(state) ) {
02054                 fprintf(out, "A ");
02055                 for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
02056                     (*pit)->Charge(state);
02057                 }
02058                 this->CalculateAlphaRigid(poles, out, true);
02059             }    
02060 
02061             state = +1;
02062             if ( (*sit)->hasChrgState(state) ) {
02063                 fprintf(out, "C ");
02064                 for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
02065                     (*pit)->Charge(state);
02066                 }
02067                 this->CalculateAlphaRigid(poles, out, true);
02068             }
02069 
02070             for (pit = poles.begin(); pit < poles.end(); ++pit) {
02071                 (*pit)->Charge(0);
02072             }
02073 
02074             fprintf(out, " \n");
02075         }
02076 
02077         return 0;
02078     }
02079 
02080 
02081     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
02082     // Create + start threads (Site Ops) //
02083     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
02084 
02085     vector<SiteOpMultipole*> siteOps;    
02086 
02087     _nextSite = top->Segments().begin();
02088 
02089     // Forward to first segment specified in options
02090     for ( ; (*_nextSite)->getId() != this->_firstSeg &&
02091               _nextSite < top->Segments().end(); ++_nextSite) { ; }
02092 
02093     for (int id = 0; id < _nThreads; id++) {
02094         SiteOpMultipole *newOp = new SiteOpMultipole(id, top, this);
02095         siteOps.push_back(newOp);
02096     }
02097 
02098     for (int id = 0; id < _nThreads; id++) {
02099         siteOps[id]->InitSlotData(top);
02100     }
02101 
02102     for (int id = 0; id < _nThreads; id++) {
02103         siteOps[id]->Start();
02104     }
02105 
02106     for (int id = 0; id < _nThreads; id++) {
02107         siteOps[id]->WaitDone();
02108     }
02109 
02110     for (int id = 0; id < _nThreads; id++) {
02111         delete siteOps[id];
02112     }
02113 
02114     siteOps.clear();
02115 
02116 
02117     // +++++++++++++++++++++ //
02118     // Print numbers to file //
02119     // +++++++++++++++++++++ //
02120 
02121     if (_energies2File) {
02122 
02123         FILE *out;
02124         string topOutFile = "Frame"
02125                           + boost::lexical_cast<string>(top->getDatabaseId())
02126                           + "_" + _outFile;
02127         out = fopen(topOutFile.c_str(), "w");
02128 
02129         vector< Segment* > ::iterator sit;
02130         for (sit = top->Segments().begin();
02131              sit < top->Segments().end();
02132              ++sit) {
02133 
02134             if ((*sit)->getId() < _firstSeg ) { continue; }
02135 
02136             fprintf(out, "%4d ", (*sit)->getId() );
02137             fprintf(out, "%4s ", (*sit)->getName().c_str() );
02138 
02139             // Energies
02140             if ((*sit)->hasChrgState(0)) {
02141                 fprintf(out, "   0 %3.8f   ", (*sit)->getEMpoles(0) );
02142             }
02143             if ((*sit)->hasChrgState(-1)) {
02144                 fprintf(out, "  -1 %3.8f   ", (*sit)->getEMpoles(-1) );
02145             }
02146 
02147             if ((*sit)->hasChrgState(+1)) {
02148                 fprintf(out, "  +1 %3.8f   ", (*sit)->getEMpoles(+1) );
02149             }
02150 
02151             // Iterations
02152             if ((*sit)->hasChrgState(0)) {
02153                 fprintf(out, "   0 %3d   ", _log_seg_iter[(*sit)->getId()][1]);
02154             }
02155             if ((*sit)->hasChrgState(-1)) {
02156                 fprintf(out, "  -1 %3d   ", _log_seg_iter[(*sit)->getId()][0]);
02157             }
02158 
02159             if ((*sit)->hasChrgState(+1)) {
02160                 fprintf(out, "  +1 %3d   ", _log_seg_iter[(*sit)->getId()][2]);
02161             }
02162 
02163             // Polarizable sphere
02164             fprintf(out, "   SPH %4d   ",
02165                     _log_seg_sphereSize[(*sit)->getId()]);
02166 
02167             fprintf(out, "   %4.7f %4.7f %4.7f   ",
02168                     _log_seg_com[(*sit)->getId()].getX(),
02169                     _log_seg_com[(*sit)->getId()].getY(),
02170                     _log_seg_com[(*sit)->getId()].getZ());
