02171 
02172             fprintf(out, " \n");
02173 
02174             if ( (*sit)->getId() == _lastSeg ) { break; }
02175         }
02176     }
02177 
02178     this->PostProcess(top);
02179     return 1;
02180 }
02181 
02182 
02183 // +++++++++++++++++ //
02184 // Thread Management //
02185 // +++++++++++++++++ //
02186 
02187 
02192 Segment *EMultipole::RequestNextSite(int opId, Topology *top) {
02193 
02194     _nextSiteMutex.Lock();
02195 
02196     Segment *workOnThis;
02197 
02198     if (_nextSite == top->Segments().end()) {
02199         workOnThis = NULL;
02200     }
02201     else if ((*_nextSite)->getId() > _lastSeg && _lastSeg > 0) {
02202         workOnThis = NULL;
02203     }
02204     else {
02205         workOnThis = *_nextSite;
02206         _nextSite++;
02207         cout << endl << "... ... OP " << opId
02208              << " evaluating energy for site "
02209              << workOnThis->getId() << flush;
02210     }
02211 
02212     _nextSiteMutex.Unlock();
02213 
02214     return workOnThis;
02215 }
02216 
02217 
02218 // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
02219 // SiteOperator Member Functions //
02220 // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
02221 
02222 void EMultipole::SiteOpMultipole::Run(void) {
02223 
02224     while (true) {
02225 
02226         _seg = _master->RequestNextSite(_id, _top);
02227 
02228         if (_seg == NULL) { break; }
02229         else { this->EvalSite(_top, _seg); }
02230     }
02231 }
02232 
02233 
02238 void EMultipole::SiteOpMultipole::InitSlotData(Topology *top) {
02239     
02240 
02241     vector< Segment* > ::iterator sitRef;
02242     vector< vector<PolarSite*> > ::iterator sitNew;
02243     vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pitRef;
02244     vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pitNew;
02245     
02246     _polarSites.resize(top->Segments().size());
02247     assert(top->Segments().size() == _polarSites.size());
02248 
02249     for (sitRef = top->Segments().begin(), sitNew = _polarSites.begin();
02250          sitRef < top->Segments().end();
02251          ++sitRef, ++sitNew) {
02252 
02253         (*sitNew).resize((*sitRef)->PolarSites().size());
02254 
02255         for (pitRef = (*sitRef)->PolarSites().begin(),
02256              pitNew = (*sitNew).begin();
02257              pitRef < (*sitRef)->PolarSites().end();
02258              ++pitRef, ++ pitNew) {
02259 
02260             *pitNew = new PolarSite();
02261             (*pitNew)->ImportFrom(*pitRef, "full");
02262             (*pitNew)->Charge(0);
02263         }
02264     }
02265 }
02266 
02267 
02271 EMultipole::SiteOpMultipole::~SiteOpMultipole() {
02272 
02273     vector< vector<PolarSite*> > ::iterator sit;
02274     vector<PolarSite*> ::iterator pol;
02275 
02276     for (sit = _polarSites.begin(); sit < _polarSites.end(); ++sit) {
02277         for (pol = (*sit).begin(); pol < (*sit).end(); ++pol) {
02278             delete *pol;
02279         }
02280         (*sit).clear();
02281     }
02282     _polarSites.clear();
02283 }
02284 
02285 
02292 void EMultipole::SiteOpMultipole::EvalSite(Topology *top, Segment *seg) {
02293 
02294     double int2eV = 1/(4*M_PI*8.854187817e-12) * 1.602176487e-19 / 1.000e-9;
02295 
02296     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
02297     // Define polarization sphere //
02298     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
02299 
02300     this->_segsPolSphere.clear(); // <- Segments    within cutoff
02301     this->_segsOutSphere.clear(); // <- Segments    within cutoff1, cutoff2
02302     this->_polsPolSphere.clear(); // <- Polar sites within cutoff
02303     this->_polsOutSphere.clear(); // <- Polar sites within cutoff1, cutoff2
02304 
02305     vector<Segment*> ::iterator sit;
02306     for (sit = top->Segments().begin(); sit < top->Segments().end(); ++sit) {
02307 
02308         double r12 = abs(_top->PbShortestConnect((*sit)->getPos(),
02309                                                     seg->getPos()));
02310 
02311         if      ( r12 > _master->_cutoff2) { continue; }
02312 
02313         else if ( r12 > _master->_cutoff ) {
02314             _segsOutSphere.push_back(*sit);
02315             _polsOutSphere.push_back( _polarSites[(*sit)->getId() - 1] );
02316         }
02317         else {
02318             _segsPolSphere.push_back(*sit);
02319             _polsPolSphere.push_back( _polarSites[(*sit)->getId() - 1] );
02320         }
02321     }
02322 
02323 
02324 //    FILE *out;
02325 //    string shellFile = "OuterShell.pdb";
02326 //    out = fopen(shellFile.c_str(), "w");
02327 //    for (sit = _segsOutSphere.begin(); sit < _segsOutSphere.end(); ++sit) {
02328 //        (*sit)->WritePDB(out, "Multipoles", "");
02329 //    }
02330 //    fclose(out);
02331 
02332 
02333 
02334     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
02335     // Investigate charge states //
02336     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
02337 
02338     if (_master->_maverick) {
02339         cout << endl
02340              << "... ... ... Segments in polarization sphere: "
02341              << _segsPolSphere.size()
02342              << "; segments in static shell: "
02343              << _segsOutSphere.size()
02344              << flush;
02345     }
02346     
02347     this->Depolarize();
02348 
02349     // Make sure, outer shell also depolarized, according to strategy
02350     vector< vector<PolarSite*> > ::iterator sit1;
02351     vector<PolarSite*> ::iterator pit;
02352     for (sit1 = _polsOutSphere.begin(); sit1 < _polsOutSphere.end(); ++sit1) {
02353         for (pit = (*sit1).begin(); pit < (*sit1).end(); ++pit) {
02354             (*pit)->Depolarize();
02355         }
02356     }
02357 
02358     // Keep track of number of iterations needed until converged
02359     vector<int> iters;
02360     iters.resize(3);
02361 
02362     int state = 0;
02363     if (_seg->hasChrgState(state)) {
02364 
02365         if (_master->_maverick) {
02366             cout << endl << "... ... ... Seg " << seg->getId()
02367                          << " Charge " << state << flush;
02368         }
02369 
02370         this->Charge(state);
02371         int iter = 0;
02372         if (_master->_induce) iter = this->Induce(state);
02373         double EState = 0.0;
02374         if (_master->_induce) EState = this->Energy(state);
02375         else                 EState = this->EnergyStatic(state);
02376         _seg->setEMpoles(state, int2eV * EState);
02377         iters[state+1] = iter;
02378 
02379 
02380         
02381 //        FILE *out;
02382 //        string toFile = boost::lexical_cast<string>(_seg->getId())
02383 //                      + "_R_absU_N.dat";
02384 //        out = fopen(toFile.c_str(), "w");
02385 //        vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit;
02386 //        vector< vector< PolarSite* > > ::iterator sit;
02387 //        vec CoM = _seg->getPos();
02388 //        for (sit = _polsPolSphere.begin(); sit < _polsPolSphere.end(); ++sit) {
02389 //            for (pit = (*sit).begin(); pit < (*sit).end(); ++pit) {
02390 //                vec r  = _top->PbShortestConnect((*pit)->getPos(), CoM);
02391 //                int segId = (*pit)->getSegment()->getId();
02392 //                double R = abs(r);
02393 //                vec u = vec( (*pit)->U1x, (*pit)->U1y, (*pit)->U1z );
02394 //                // double U = abs(u);
02395 //                fprintf(out, "%4.7f %4.7f %4.7f %4.7f  %4.7f %4.7f %4.7f %4d\n",
02396 //                              R, r.getX(), r.getY(), r.getZ(), u.getX(), u.getY(), u.getZ(), segId);
02397 //            }
02398 //        }
02399 //        fclose(out);
02400         
02401         
02402 //        // For visual check of convergence
02403 //        string mpNAME = "seg1_cation.dat";
02404 //        FILE *mpDat = NULL;
02405 //        mpDat = fopen(mpNAME.c_str(), "w");
02406 //        vector<PolarSite*>::iterator pit;
02407 //        for (pit = _polsPolSphere[0].begin();
02408 //             pit < _polsPolSphere[0].end();
02409 //             ++pit) {
02410 //            (*pit)->PrintInfoVisual(mpDat);
02411 //        }
02412 //        for (pit = _polsPolSphere[1].begin();
02413 //             pit < _polsPolSphere[1].end();
02414 //             ++pit) {
02415 //            (*pit)->PrintInfoVisual(mpDat);
02416 //        }
02417 //        fclose(mpDat);
02418         
02419         // this->Depolarize(); // OVERRIDE
02420         vector< vector<PolarSite*> > ::iterator sit1;
02421         vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit1;
02422         for (sit1 = _polsPolSphere.begin(); sit1 < _polsPolSphere.end(); ++sit1) {
02423             for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
02424                 (*pit1)->ResetFieldU();
02425                 (*pit1)->ResetFieldP();
02426                 (*pit1)->ResetU1Hist();
02427             }
02428         }
02429     }
02430 
02431     state = -1;
02432     if (_seg->hasChrgState(state)) {
02433 
02434         if (_master->_maverick) {
02435             cout << endl << "... ... ... Seg " << seg->getId()
02436                          << " Charge " << state << flush;
02437         }
02438 
02439         this->Charge(state);
02440         int iter = 0;
02441         if (_master->_induce) iter = this->Induce(state);
02442         double EState = 0.0;
02443         if (_master->_induce) EState = this->Energy(state);
02444         else                 EState = this->EnergyStatic(state);
02445         _seg->setEMpoles(state, int2eV * EState);
02446         iters[state+1] = iter;
02447 
02448         /*
02449         // For visual check of convergence
02450         string mpNAME = "seg1_cation.dat";
02451         FILE *mpDat = NULL;
02452         mpDat = fopen(mpNAME.c_str(), "w");
02453         vector<PolarSite*>::iterator pit;
02454         for (pit = _polsPolSphere[0].begin();
02455              pit < _polsPolSphere[0].end();
02456              ++pit) {
02457             (*pit)->PrintInfoVisual(mpDat);
02458         }
02459         fclose(mpDat);
02460         */
02461 
02462         // this->Depolarize(); // OVERRIDE
02463         vector< vector<PolarSite*> > ::iterator sit1;
02464         vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit1;
02465         for (sit1 = _polsPolSphere.begin(); sit1 < _polsPolSphere.end(); ++sit1) {
02466             for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
02467                 (*pit1)->ResetFieldU();
02468                 (*pit1)->ResetFieldP();
02469                 (*pit1)->ResetU1Hist();
02470             }
02471         }
02472     }
02473 
02474     state = +1;
02475     if (_seg->hasChrgState(state)) {
02476 
02477         if (_master->_maverick) {
02478             cout << endl << "... ... ... Seg " << seg->getId()
02479                          << " Charge " << state << flush;
02480         }
02481         
02482         this->Charge(state);
02483         int iter = 0;
02484         if (_master->_induce) iter = this->Induce(state);
02485         double EState = 0.0;
02486         if (_master->_induce) EState = this->Energy(state);
02487         else                 EState = this->EnergyStatic(state);
02488         _seg->setEMpoles(state, int2eV * EState);
02489         iters[state+1] = iter;
02490 
02491 
02492         
02493 //        FILE *out;
02494 //        string toFile = boost::lexical_cast<string>(_seg->getId())
02495 //                      + "_R_absU_C.dat";
02496 //        out = fopen(toFile.c_str(), "w");
02497 //        vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit;
02498 //        vector< vector< PolarSite* > > ::iterator sit;
02499 //        vec CoM = _seg->getPos();
02500 //        for (sit = _polsPolSphere.begin(); sit < _polsPolSphere.end(); ++sit) {
02501 //            for (pit = (*sit).begin(); pit < (*sit).end(); ++pit) {
02502 //                vec r  = _top->PbShortestConnect((*pit)->getPos(), CoM);
02503 //                int segId = (*pit)->getSegment()->getId();
02504 //                double R = abs(r);
02505 //                vec u = vec( (*pit)->U1x, (*pit)->U1y, (*pit)->U1z );
02506 //                // double U = abs(u);
02507 //                fprintf(out, "%4.7f %4.7f %4.7f %4.7f  %4.7f %4.7f %4.7f %4d \n",
02508 //                              R, r.getX(), r.getY(), r.getZ(), u.getX(), u.getY(), u.getZ(), segId);
02509 //            }
02510 //        }
02511 //        fclose(out);
02512         
02513         
02514 //        // For visual check of convergence
02515 //        string mpNAME = "seg1_neutral.dat";
02516 //        FILE *mpDat = NULL;
02517 //        mpDat = fopen(mpNAME.c_str(), "w");
02518 //        vector<PolarSite*>::iterator pit;
02519 //        for (pit = _polsPolSphere[0].begin();
02520 //             pit < _polsPolSphere[0].end();
02521 //             ++pit) {
02522 //            (*pit)->PrintInfoVisual(mpDat);
02523 //        }
02524 //        for (pit = _polsPolSphere[1].begin();
02525 //             pit < _polsPolSphere[1].end();
02526 //             ++pit) {
02527 //            (*pit)->PrintInfoVisual(mpDat);
02528 //        }
02529 //        fclose(mpDat);
02530         
02531         
02532         this->Depolarize();
02533 
02534     }
02535 
02536     this->_master->_logMutex.Lock();
02537     _master->_log_seg_iter[_seg->getId()] = iters;
02538     _master->_log_seg_sphereSize[_seg->getId()] = _polsPolSphere.size();
02539     _master->_log_seg_com[_seg->getId()] = _seg->getPos();
02540     this->_master->_logMutex.Unlock();
02541 
02542     this->Charge(0);
02543 
02544 }
02545 
02546 
02551 void EMultipole::SiteOpMultipole::Charge(int state) {
02552 
02553     vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit;
02554     for (pit = _polarSites[_seg->getId()-1].begin();
02555          pit < _polarSites[_seg->getId()-1].end();
02556          ++pit) {
02557 
02558         (*pit)->Charge(state);
02559     }
02560 }
02561 
02562 
02566 int EMultipole::SiteOpMultipole::Induce(int state) {
02567 
02568     double wSOR = (state == 0) ? _master->_wSOR_N : _master->_wSOR_C;
02569     double eTOL = this->_master->_epsTol;
02570     int    maxI = this->_master->_maxIter;
02571 
02572     vector< vector<PolarSite*> > ::iterator sit1;
02573     vector< vector<PolarSite*> > ::iterator sit2;
02574     vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit1;
02575     vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit2;
02576 
02577     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
02578     // Inter-site fields (arising from perm. m'poles) //
02579     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
02580 
02581 //    cout << endl << "... ... ... 0th-order field" << flush;
02582     for (sit1 = _polsPolSphere.begin();
02583          sit1 < _polsPolSphere.end();
02584          ++sit1) {
02585     for (sit2 = sit1 + 1;
02586          sit2 < _polsPolSphere.end();
02587          ++sit2) {
02588 
02589          for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
02590          for (pit2 = (*sit2).begin(); pit2 < (*sit2).end(); ++pit2) {
02591 
02592              _actor.FieldPerm(*(*pit1), *(*pit2));
02593          }}
02594     }}
02595 
02596     // +++++++++++++++++++ //
02597     // 1st-order induction //
02598     // +++++++++++++++++++ //
02599 
02600 //    cout << " | Induce " << endl;
02601     if (state == 0) { // OVERRIDE
02602         for (sit1 = _polsPolSphere.begin();
02603              sit1 < _polsPolSphere.end();
02604              ++sit1) {
02605 
02606              for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
02607                  (*pit1)->InduceDirect();
02608              }
02609         }
02610     }
02611 
02612 
02613 
02614     // ++++++++++++++++++++++ //
02615     // Higher-order induction //
02616     // ++++++++++++++++++++++ //
02617 
02618     int iter = 0;
02619 //    boost::progress_timer T;
02620     for ( ; iter < maxI; ++iter) {
02621 
02622         // Reset fields FUx, FUy, FUz
02623 //        cout << "\r... ... ... Reset (" << iter << ")" << flush;
02624         for (sit1 = _polsPolSphere.begin();
02625              sit1 < _polsPolSphere.end();
02626              ++sit1) {
02627 
02628             for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
02629                 (*pit1)->ResetFieldU();
02630             }
02631         }
02632 
02633         // Intra-site contribution to induction field
02634 //        cout << " | Intra-Site (" << iter << ")" << flush;
02635         for (sit1 = _polsPolSphere.begin();
02636              sit1 < _polsPolSphere.end();
02637              ++sit1) {
02638 
02639             for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
02640             for (pit2 = pit1 + 1;        pit2 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit2) {
02641 
02642                 _actor.FieldIndu(*(*pit1),*(*pit2));
02643             }}
02644         }
02645 
02646         // Inter-site contribution to induction field
02647 //        cout << " | Inter-Site (" << iter << ")" << flush;
02648         //boost::progress_display show_progress( _polsPolSphere.size() );
02649 //        T.restart();
02650         for (sit1 = _polsPolSphere.begin();
02651              sit1 < _polsPolSphere.end();
02652              ++sit1) {
02653         for (sit2 = sit1 + 1;
02654              sit2 < _polsPolSphere.end();
02655              ++sit2) {
02656 
02657             for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
02658             for (pit2 = (*sit2).begin(); pit2 < (*sit2).end(); ++pit2) {
02659 
02660                 _actor.FieldIndu(*(*pit1), *(*pit2));
02661             }}
02662         }}
02663 //        cout << " | dt " << T.elapsed() << flush;
02664 
02665         // Induce again
02666 //        cout << " | Induce (" << iter << ")" << flush;
02667         for (sit1 = _polsPolSphere.begin();
02668              sit1 < _polsPolSphere.end();
02669              ++sit1) {
02670 
02671              for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
02672                  (*pit1)->Induce(wSOR);
02673              }
02674         }        
02675 
02676         // Check for convergence
02677 //        cout << " | Check (" << iter << ")" << flush;
02678         bool converged = true;
02679         double maxdU = -1;
02680         double avgdU = 0.0;
02681         int    baseN = 0;
02682         for (sit1 = _polsPolSphere.begin();
02683              sit1 < _polsPolSphere.end();
02684              ++sit1) {
02685 
02686              for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
02687                  double dU = (*pit1)->HistdU();
02688                  avgdU += dU;
02689                  ++baseN;
02690                  if ( dU > maxdU ) { maxdU = dU; }
02691                  if ( dU > eTOL ) { converged = false; }
02692              }
02693         }
02694         avgdU /= baseN;
02695         if (avgdU < eTOL/10.) { converged = true; }
02696 
02697 //        cout << " | MAX dU " << maxdU
02698 //             << " | AVG dU " << avgdU
02699 //             << " | SOR " << wSOR << flush;
02700 
02701         // Break if converged
02702         if      (converged) {
02703             break;
02704         }
02705         else if (iter == maxI - 1) {
02706             this->_master->LockCout();
02707             cout << endl << "... ... ... WARNING Induced multipoles for site "
02708                  << _seg->getId() << " - state " << state 
02709                  << " did not converge to precision: "
02710                  << " AVG dU:U " << avgdU << flush;
02711             this->_master->UnlockCout();
02712             break;
02713         }
02714     }
02715 
02716     return iter;
02717     
02718 //    cout << endl << "... ... ... State " << state
02719 //         << " - wSOR " << wSOR
02720 //         << " - Iterations " << iter << flush;
02721 }
02722 
02723 
02724 double EMultipole::SiteOpMultipole::EnergyStatic(int state) {
02725 
02726     _actor.ResetEnergy();
02727     double E_Tot = 0.0;
02728 
02729     vector< Segment* > ::iterator seg1;
02730     vector< Segment* > ::iterator seg2;
02731     vector< vector<PolarSite*> > ::iterator sit1;
02732     vector< vector<PolarSite*> > ::iterator sit2;
02733     vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit1;
02734     vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit2;
02735 
02736     vector< PolarSite* > central = _polarSites[ _seg->getId() - 1 ];
02737 
02738 
02739     for (seg1 = _segsPolSphere.begin(); seg1 < _segsPolSphere.end(); ++seg1) {
02740 
02741         int id = (*seg1)->getId();
02742 
02743         if (id == _seg->getId()) {
02744             continue;
02745         }
02746 
02747         for (pit1 = _polarSites[id-1].begin();
02748              pit1 < _polarSites[id-1].end();
02749              ++pit1) {
02750         for (pit2 = central.begin();
02751              pit2 < central.end();
02752              ++pit2) {
02753 
02754              E_Tot += _actor.EnergyInter(*(*pit1), *(*pit2));
02755         }}
02756     }
02757 
02758     if (_master->_maverick) {
02759         cout << endl << "... ... ... ... E(" << state << ") = " << E_Tot
02760              << " = (P ~) " << _actor.getEP()
02761              << " + (U ~) " << _actor.getEU_INTER()
02762              << " + (U o) " << _actor.getEU_INTRA()
02763              << " , statics only. "
02764              << flush;
02765     }
02766 
02767     return E_Tot;
02768 }
02769 
02770 
02774 double EMultipole::SiteOpMultipole::Energy(int state) {
02775 
02776     _actor.ResetEnergy();
02777     double E_Tot = 0.0;
02778 
02779     vector< Segment* > ::iterator seg1;
02780     vector< Segment* > ::iterator seg2;
02781     vector< vector<PolarSite*> > ::iterator sit1;
02782     vector< vector<PolarSite*> > ::iterator sit2;
02783     vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit1;
02784     vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit2;
02785 
02786     // +++++++++++++++++ //
02787     // Inter-site energy //
02788     // +++++++++++++++++ //
02789 
02790     for (sit1 = _polsPolSphere.begin(), seg1 = _segsPolSphere.begin();
02791          sit1 < _polsPolSphere.end();
02792          ++sit1, ++seg1) {
02793     for (sit2 = sit1 + 1, seg2 = seg1 + 1;
02794          sit2 < _polsPolSphere.end();
02795          ++sit2, ++seg2) {
02796 
02797         //if ( abs(_top->PbShortestConnect((*seg1)->getPos(),_seg->getPos()))
02798         //        > _master->_cutoff) { throw runtime_error("Not this."); }
02799 
02800         //cout << "\r... ... Calculating interaction energy for pair "
02801         //     << (*seg1)->getId() << "|" << (*seg2)->getId() << "   " << flush;
02802 
02803 
02804         for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
02805         for (pit2 = (*sit2).begin(); pit2 < (*sit2).end(); ++pit2) {
02806 
02807             //(*pit1)->PrintInfo(cout);
02808             //(*pit2)->PrintInfo(cout);
02809 
02810             E_Tot += _actor.EnergyInter(*(*pit1), *(*pit2));
02811 
02812         }}
02813     }}
02814 
02815     // +++++++++++++++++ //
02816     // Intra-site energy //
02817     // +++++++++++++++++ //
02818 
02819 //    // Not needed here
02820 //    for (sit1 = _polsPolSphere.begin(), seg1 = _segsPolSphere.begin();
02821 //         sit1 < _polsPolSphere.end();
02822 //         ++sit1, ++seg1) {
02823 //
02824 //        for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
02825 //        for (pit2 = pit1 + 1; pit2 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit2) {
02826 //
02827 //            E_Tot += _actor.EnergyIntra(*(*pit1), *(*pit2)); // OVERRIDE
02828 //
02829 //        }}
02830 //    }
02831 
02832     // ++++++++++++++++++ //
02833     // Outer-Shell energy //
02834     // ++++++++++++++++++ //
02835 
02836     double E_Out = 0.0;
02837 
02838     vector< PolarSite* > central = _polarSites[ _seg->getId() - 1 ];
02839 
02840     for (sit1 = _polsOutSphere.begin(); sit1 < _polsOutSphere.end(); ++sit1) {
02841         for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
02842             for (pit2 = central.begin(); pit2 < central.end(); ++pit2) {
02843                 E_Out += _actor.EnergyInter(*(*pit1), *(*pit2));
02844             }
02845         }
02846     }
02847     E_Tot += E_Out;
02848 
02849 
02850     if (_master->_maverick) {
02851         cout << endl << "... ... ... ... E(" << state << ") = " << E_Tot
02852              << " = (P ~) " << _actor.getEP()
02853              << " + (U ~) " << _actor.getEU_INTER()
02854              << " + (U o) " << _actor.getEU_INTRA()
02855              << " , (O ~) " << E_Out
02856              << flush;
02857     }
02858 
02859     return E_Tot;
02860 }
02861 
02862 
02867 void EMultipole::SiteOpMultipole::Depolarize() {
02868 
02869     vector< vector<PolarSite*> > ::iterator sit;
02870     vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit;
02871 
02872     for (sit = _polsPolSphere.begin(); sit < _polsPolSphere.end(); ++sit) {
02873         for (pit = (*sit).begin(); pit < (*sit).end(); ++pit) {
02874 
02875             (*pit)->Depolarize();
02876         }
02877     }
02878 }
02879 
02880 
02881 // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
02882 // Interactor Member Functions //
02883 // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
02884 
02888 inline double EMultipole::Interactor::PotentialPerm(vec r,
02889                                                      PolarSite &pol) {
02890 
02891     // NOTE >>> e12 points from polar site 1 to polar site 2 <<< NOTE //
02892     e12  = pol.getPos() - r;
02893     R    = 1/abs(e12);
02894     R2   = R*R;
02895     R3   = R2*R;
02896     R4   = R3*R;
02897     R5   = R4*R;
02898     e12 *= R;
02899 
02900     
02901 
02902 
02903     rbx = - pol._locX * e12;
02904     rby = - pol._locY * e12;
02905     rbz = - pol._locZ * e12;
02906 
02907     double phi00 = 0.0;
02908     
02909         phi00 += T00_00() * pol.Q00;
02910     
02911     if (pol._rank > 0) {        
02912         phi00 += T00_1x() * pol.Q1x;
02913         phi00 += T00_1y() * pol.Q1y;
02914         phi00 += T00_1z() * pol.Q1z;        
02915     }
02916         
02917     if (pol._rank > 1) {
02918         phi00 += T00_20()  * pol.Q20;
02919         phi00 += T00_21c() * pol.Q21c;
02920         phi00 += T00_21s() * pol.Q21s;
02921         phi00 += T00_22c() * pol.Q22c;
02922         phi00 += T00_22s() * pol.Q22s;
02923     }
02924 
02925     return phi00;
02926 }
02927 
02931 inline vec EMultipole::Interactor::FieldPermESF(vec r,
02932                                                  PolarSite &pol) {
02933     // NOTE >>> e12 points from polar site 1 to polar site 2 <<< NOTE //
02934     e12  = pol.getPos() - r;
02935     R    = 1/abs(e12);
02936     R2   = R*R;
02937     R3   = R2*R;
02938     R4   = R3*R;
02939     R5   = R4*R;
02940     e12 *= R;
02941 
02942         rax = e12.getX();
02943         ray = e12.getY();
02944         raz = e12.getZ();
02945         rbx = - rax;
02946         rby = - ray;
02947         rbz = - raz;
02948 
02949         cxx = 1;
02950         cxy = 0;
02951         cxz = 0;
02952         cyx = 0;
02953         cyy = 1;
02954         cyz = 0;
02955         czx = 0;
02956         czy = 0;
02957         czz = 1;
02958 
02959     double Fx = 0.0;
02960     double Fy = 0.0;
02961     double Fz = 0.0;
02962 
02963     // Field generated by rank-0 m'pole
02964         Fx += T1x_00() * pol.Q00;
02965         Fy += T1y_00() * pol.Q00;
02966         Fz += T1z_00() * pol.Q00;
02967 
02968     // Field generated by rank-1 m'pole
02969     if (pol._rank > 0) {
02970         Fx += T1x_1x() * pol.Q1x;
02971         Fx += T1x_1y() * pol.Q1y;
02972         Fx += T1x_1z() * pol.Q1z;
02973 
02974         Fy += T1y_1x() * pol.Q1x;
02975         Fy += T1y_1y() * pol.Q1y;
02976         Fy += T1y_1z() * pol.Q1z;
02977 
02978         Fz += T1z_1x() * pol.Q1x;
02979         Fz += T1z_1y() * pol.Q1y;
02980         Fz += T1z_1z() * pol.Q1z;
02981     }
02982 
02983     // Field generated by rank-2 m'pole
02984     if (pol._rank > 1) {
02985         Fx += T1x_20()  * pol.Q20;
02986         Fx += T1x_21c() * pol.Q21c;
02987         Fx += T1x_21s() * pol.Q21s;
02988         Fx += T1x_22c() * pol.Q22c;
02989         Fx += T1x_22s() * pol.Q22s;
02990 
02991         Fy += T1y_20()  * pol.Q20;
02992         Fy += T1y_21c() * pol.Q21c;
02993         Fy += T1y_21s() * pol.Q21s;
02994         Fy += T1y_22c() * pol.Q22c;
02995         Fy += T1y_22s() * pol.Q22s;
02996 
02997         Fz += T1z_20()  * pol.Q20;
02998         Fz += T1z_21c() * pol.Q21c;
02999         Fz += T1z_21s() * pol.Q21s;
03000         Fz += T1z_22c() * pol.Q22c;
03001         Fz += T1z_22s() * pol.Q22s;
03002     }
03003 
03004     return vec(Fx, Fy, Fz);
03005 }
03006 
03010 inline void EMultipole::Interactor::FieldInduAlpha(PolarSite &pol1,
03011                                                     PolarSite &pol2) {
03012     // NOTE >>> e12 points from polar site 1 to polar site 2 <<< NOTE //
03013     e12  = pol2.getPos() - pol1.getPos();
03014     R    = 1/abs(e12);
03015     R2   = R*R;
03016     R3   = R2*R;
03017     R4   = R3*R;
03018     R5   = R4*R;
03019     e12 *= R;
03020 
03021     // Thole damping init.
03022     a    = _em->_aDamp;
03023     u3   = 1 / (R3 * sqrt(pol1.P1 * pol2.P1));
03024 
03025 //        rax =   pol1._locX * e12;
03026 //        ray =   pol1._locY * e12;
03027 //        raz =   pol1._locZ * e12;
03028 //        rbx = - pol2._locX * e12;
03029 //        rby = - pol2._locY * e12;
03030 //        rbz = - pol2._locZ * e12;
03031 
03032         rax = e12.getX();
03033         ray = e12.getY();
03034         raz = e12.getZ();
03035         rbx = - rax;
03036         rby = - ray;
03037         rbz = - raz;
03038 
03039 //        cxx = pol1._locX * pol2._locX;
03040 //        cxy = pol1._locX * pol2._locY;
03041 //        cxz = pol1._locX * pol2._locZ;
03042 //        cyx = pol1._locY * pol2._locX;
03043 //        cyy = pol1._locY * pol2._locY;
03044 //        cyz = pol1._locY * pol2._locZ;
03045 //        czx = pol1._locZ * pol2._locX;
03046 //        czy = pol1._locZ * pol2._locY;
03047 //        czz = pol1._locZ * pol2._locZ;
03048 
03049         cxx = 1;
03050         cxy = 0;
03051         cxz = 0;
03052         cyx = 0;
03053         cyy = 1;
03054         cyz = 0;
03055         czx = 0;
03056         czy = 0;
03057         czz = 1;
03058 
03059     // Fields generated by rank-1 induced m'poles
03060 
03061     if (a*u3 < 40.0) {
03062         pol1.FUx += TU1x_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03063         pol1.FUx += TU1x_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03064         pol1.FUx += TU1x_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03065         pol1.FUy += TU1y_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03066         pol1.FUy += TU1y_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03067         pol1.FUy += TU1y_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03068         pol1.FUz += TU1z_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03069         pol1.FUz += TU1z_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03070         pol1.FUz += TU1z_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03071 
03072         pol2.FUx += TU1x_1x() * pol1.U1x;
03073         pol2.FUx += TU1y_1x() * pol1.U1y;
03074         pol2.FUx += TU1z_1x() * pol1.U1z;
03075         pol2.FUy += TU1x_1y() * pol1.U1x;
03076         pol2.FUy += TU1y_1y() * pol1.U1y;
03077         pol2.FUy += TU1z_1y() * pol1.U1z;
03078         pol2.FUz += TU1x_1z() * pol1.U1x;
03079         pol2.FUz += TU1y_1z() * pol1.U1y;
03080         pol2.FUz += TU1z_1z() * pol1.U1z;
03081     }
03082     else {
03083         pol1.FUx += T1x_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03084         pol1.FUx += T1x_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03085         pol1.FUx += T1x_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03086         pol1.FUy += T1y_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03087         pol1.FUy += T1y_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03088         pol1.FUy += T1y_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03089         pol1.FUz += T1z_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03090         pol1.FUz += T1z_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03091         pol1.FUz += T1z_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03092 
03093         pol2.FUx += T1x_1x() * pol1.U1x;
03094         pol2.FUx += T1y_1x() * pol1.U1y;
03095         pol2.FUx += T1z_1x() * pol1.U1z;
03096         pol2.FUy += T1x_1y() * pol1.U1x;
03097         pol2.FUy += T1y_1y() * pol1.U1y;
03098         pol2.FUy += T1z_1y() * pol1.U1z;
03099         pol2.FUz += T1x_1z() * pol1.U1x;
03100         pol2.FUz += T1y_1z() * pol1.U1y;
03101         pol2.FUz += T1z_1z() * pol1.U1z;
03102     }
03103 }
03104 
03108 inline void EMultipole::Interactor::FieldIndu(PolarSite &pol1,
03109                                                PolarSite &pol2) {
03110 
03111     // NOTE >>> e12 points from polar site 1 to polar site 2 <<< NOTE //
03112     //          This implies that induced = - alpha * field
03113     e12  = _top->PbShortestConnect(pol1.getPos(), pol2.getPos());
03114     R    = 1/abs(e12);
03115     R2   = R*R;
03116     R3   = R2*R;
03117     R4   = R3*R;
03118     R5   = R4*R;
03119     e12 *= R;
03120 
03121     // Thole damping init.
03122     a    = _em->_aDamp;
03123     u3   = 1 / (R3 * sqrt(pol1.P1 * pol2.P1));
03124 
03125 //        rax =   pol1._locX * e12;
03126 //        ray =   pol1._locY * e12;
03127 //        raz =   pol1._locZ * e12;
03128 //        rbx = - pol2._locX * e12;
03129 //        rby = - pol2._locY * e12;
03130 //        rbz = - pol2._locZ * e12;
03131 
03132         rax = e12.getX();
03133         ray = e12.getY();
03134         raz = e12.getZ();
03135         rbx = - rax;
03136         rby = - ray;
03137         rbz = - raz;
03138 
03139 //        cxx = pol1._locX * pol2._locX;
03140 //        cxy = pol1._locX * pol2._locY;
03141 //        cxz = pol1._locX * pol2._locZ;
03142 //        cyx = pol1._locY * pol2._locX;
03143 //        cyy = pol1._locY * pol2._locY;
03144 //        cyz = pol1._locY * pol2._locZ;
03145 //        czx = pol1._locZ * pol2._locX;
03146 //        czy = pol1._locZ * pol2._locY;
03147 //        czz = pol1._locZ * pol2._locZ;
03148 
03149         cxx = 1;
03150         cxy = 0;
03151         cxz = 0;
03152         cyx = 0;
03153         cyy = 1;
03154         cyz = 0;
03155         czx = 0;
03156         czy = 0;
03157         czz = 1;
03158 
03159     // Fields generated by rank-1 induced m'poles
03160 
03161     if (a*u3 < 40.0) {
03162         pol1.FUx += TU1x_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03163         pol1.FUx += TU1x_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03164         pol1.FUx += TU1x_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03165         pol1.FUy += TU1y_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03166         pol1.FUy += TU1y_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03167         pol1.FUy += TU1y_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03168         pol1.FUz += TU1z_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03169         pol1.FUz += TU1z_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03170         pol1.FUz += TU1z_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03171 
03172         pol2.FUx += TU1x_1x() * pol1.U1x;
03173         pol2.FUx += TU1y_1x() * pol1.U1y;
03174         pol2.FUx += TU1z_1x() * pol1.U1z;
03175         pol2.FUy += TU1x_1y() * pol1.U1x;
03176         pol2.FUy += TU1y_1y() * pol1.U1y;
03177         pol2.FUy += TU1z_1y() * pol1.U1z;
03178         pol2.FUz += TU1x_1z() * pol1.U1x;
03179         pol2.FUz += TU1y_1z() * pol1.U1y;
03180         pol2.FUz += TU1z_1z() * pol1.U1z;
03181     }
03182     else {
03183         pol1.FUx += T1x_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03184         pol1.FUx += T1x_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03185         pol1.FUx += T1x_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03186         pol1.FUy += T1y_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03187         pol1.FUy += T1y_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03188         pol1.FUy += T1y_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03189         pol1.FUz += T1z_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03190         pol1.FUz += T1z_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03191         pol1.FUz += T1z_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03192 
03193         pol2.FUx += T1x_1x() * pol1.U1x;
03194         pol2.FUx += T1y_1x() * pol1.U1y;
03195         pol2.FUx += T1z_1x() * pol1.U1z;
03196         pol2.FUy += T1x_1y() * pol1.U1x;
03197         pol2.FUy += T1y_1y() * pol1.U1y;
03198         pol2.FUy += T1z_1y() * pol1.U1z;
03199         pol2.FUz += T1x_1z() * pol1.U1x;
03200         pol2.FUz += T1y_1z() * pol1.U1y;
03201         pol2.FUz += T1z_1z() * pol1.U1z;  
03202     }
03203 }
03204 
03208 inline void EMultipole::Interactor::FieldPerm(PolarSite &pol1,
03209                                                PolarSite &pol2) {
03210 
03211     // NOTE >>> e12 points from polar site 1 to polar site 2 <<< NOTE //
03212     //          This implies that induced = - alpha * field
03213     e12  = _top->PbShortestConnect(pol1.getPos(), pol2.getPos());
03214     R    = 1/abs(e12);
03215     R2   = R*R;
03216     R3   = R2*R;
03217     R4   = R3*R;
03218     R5   = R4*R;
03219     e12 *= R;
03220 
03221 //        rax =   pol1._locX * e12;
03222 //        ray =   pol1._locY * e12;
03223 //        raz =   pol1._locZ * e12;
03224 //        rbx = - pol2._locX * e12;
03225 //        rby = - pol2._locY * e12;
03226 //        rbz = - pol2._locZ * e12;
03227 
03228         rax = e12.getX();
03229         ray = e12.getY();
03230         raz = e12.getZ();
03231         rbx = - rax;
03232         rby = - ray;
03233         rbz = - raz;
03234 
03235     if (pol1._rank > 0 || pol2._rank > 0) {
03236 //        cxx = pol1._locX * pol2._locX;
03237 //        cxy = pol1._locX * pol2._locY;
03238 //        cxz = pol1._locX * pol2._locZ;
03239 //        cyx = pol1._locY * pol2._locX;
03240 //        cyy = pol1._locY * pol2._locY;
03241 //        cyz = pol1._locY * pol2._locZ;
03242 //        czx = pol1._locZ * pol2._locX;
03243 //        czy = pol1._locZ * pol2._locY;
03244 //        czz = pol1._locZ * pol2._locZ;
03245 
03246         cxx = 1;
03247         cxy = 0;
03248         cxz = 0;
03249         cyx = 0;
03250         cyy = 1;
03251         cyz = 0;
03252         czx = 0;
03253         czy = 0;
03254         czz = 1;
03255     }
03256 
03257     // Fields generated by rank-0 m'poles
03258         pol1.FPx += T1x_00() * pol2.Q00;
03259         pol1.FPy += T1y_00() * pol2.Q00;
03260         pol1.FPz += T1z_00() * pol2.Q00;
03261 
03262         pol2.FPx += T00_1x() * pol1.Q00;
03263         pol2.FPy += T00_1y() * pol1.Q00;
03264         pol2.FPz += T00_1z() * pol1.Q00;
03265 
03266     // Fields generated by rank-1 m'poles
03267     if (pol2._rank > 0) {
03268         pol1.FPx += T1x_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03269         pol1.FPx += T1x_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03270         pol1.FPx += T1x_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03271         pol1.FPy += T1y_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03272         pol1.FPy += T1y_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03273         pol1.FPy += T1y_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03274         pol1.FPz += T1z_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03275         pol1.FPz += T1z_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03276         pol1.FPz += T1z_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03277     }
03278     if (pol1._rank > 0) {
03279         pol2.FPx += T1x_1x() * pol1.Q1x;
03280         pol2.FPx += T1y_1x() * pol1.Q1y;
03281         pol2.FPx += T1z_1x() * pol1.Q1z;
03282         pol2.FPy += T1x_1y() * pol1.Q1x;
03283         pol2.FPy += T1y_1y() * pol1.Q1y;
03284         pol2.FPy += T1z_1y() * pol1.Q1z;
03285         pol2.FPz += T1x_1z() * pol1.Q1x;
03286         pol2.FPz += T1y_1z() * pol1.Q1y;
03287         pol2.FPz += T1z_1z() * pol1.Q1z;
03288     }
03289 
03290     // Fields generated by rank-2 m'poles
03291     if (pol2._rank > 1) {
03292         pol1.FPx += T1x_20()  * pol2.Q20;
03293         pol1.FPx += T1x_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03294         pol1.FPx += T1x_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03295         pol1.FPx += T1x_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03296         pol1.FPx += T1x_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03297 
03298         pol1.FPy += T1y_20()  * pol2.Q20;
03299         pol1.FPy += T1y_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03300         pol1.FPy += T1y_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03301         pol1.FPy += T1y_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03302         pol1.FPy += T1y_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03303 
03304         pol1.FPz += T1z_20()  * pol2.Q20;
03305         pol1.FPz += T1z_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03306         pol1.FPz += T1z_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03307         pol1.FPz += T1z_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03308         pol1.FPz += T1z_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03309     }
03310     if (pol1._rank > 1) {
03311         pol2.FPx += T20_1x()  * pol1.Q20;
03312         pol2.FPx += T21c_1x() * pol1.Q21c;
03313         pol2.FPx += T21s_1x() * pol1.Q21s;
03314         pol2.FPx += T22c_1x() * pol1.Q22c;
03315         pol2.FPx += T22s_1x() * pol1.Q22s;
03316 
03317         pol2.FPy += T20_1y()  * pol1.Q20;
03318         pol2.FPy += T21c_1y() * pol1.Q21c;
03319         pol2.FPy += T21s_1y() * pol1.Q21s;
03320         pol2.FPy += T22c_1y() * pol1.Q22c;
03321         pol2.FPy += T22s_1y() * pol1.Q22s;
03322 
03323         pol2.FPz += T20_1z()  * pol1.Q20;
03324         pol2.FPz += T21c_1z() * pol1.Q21c;
03325         pol2.FPz += T21s_1z() * pol1.Q21s;
03326         pol2.FPz += T22c_1z() * pol1.Q22c;
03327         pol2.FPz += T22s_1z() * pol1.Q22s;        
03328     }
03329 }
03330 
03334 inline double EMultipole::Interactor::EnergyIntra(PolarSite &pol1,
03335                                                    PolarSite &pol2) {    
03336 
03337     // NOTE >>> e12 points from polar site 1 to polar site 2 <<< NOTE //
03338     e12  = _top->PbShortestConnect(pol1.getPos(), pol2.getPos());
03339     R    = 1/abs(e12);
03340     R2   = R*R;
03341     R3   = R2*R;
03342     R4   = R3*R;
03343     R5   = R4*R;
03344     e12 *= R;
03345     
03346     // Thole damping init.
03347     a    = _em->_aDamp;
03348     u3   = 1 / (R3 * sqrt(pol1.P1 * pol2.P1));
03349 
03350 //        rax =   pol1._locX * e12;
03351 //        ray =   pol1._locY * e12;
03352 //        raz =   pol1._locZ * e12;
03353 //        rbx = - pol2._locX * e12;
03354 //        rby = - pol2._locY * e12;
03355 //        rbz = - pol2._locZ * e12;
03356 
03357         rax = e12.getX();
03358         ray = e12.getY();
03359         raz = e12.getZ();
03360         rbx = - rax;
03361         rby = - ray;
03362         rbz = - raz;
03363 
03364     if (pol1._rank > 0 || pol2._rank > 0) {
03365 //        cxx = pol1._locX * pol2._locX;
03366 //        cxy = pol1._locX * pol2._locY;
03367 //        cxz = pol1._locX * pol2._locZ;
03368 //        cyx = pol1._locY * pol2._locX;
03369 //        cyy = pol1._locY * pol2._locY;
03370 //        cyz = pol1._locY * pol2._locZ;
03371 //        czx = pol1._locZ * pol2._locX;
03372 //        czy = pol1._locZ * pol2._locY;
03373 //        czz = pol1._locZ * pol2._locZ;
03374 
03375         cxx = 1;
03376         cxy = 0;
03377         cxz = 0;
03378         cyx = 0;
03379         cyy = 1;
03380         cyz = 0;
03381         czx = 0;
03382         czy = 0;
03383         czz = 1;
03384     }
03385 
03386     double U = 0.0; // <- Induction energy
03387 
03388     if (a*u3 < 40.0) {
03389         U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_00() * pol2.Q00;
03390         U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_00() * pol2.Q00;
03391         U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_00() * pol2.Q00;
03392 
03393         U += pol1.Q00 * TU00_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03394         U += pol1.Q00 * TU00_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03395         U += pol1.Q00 * TU00_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03396     }
03397     else {
03398         U += pol1.U1x * T1x_00() * pol2.Q00;
03399         U += pol1.U1y * T1y_00() * pol2.Q00;
03400         U += pol1.U1z * T1z_00() * pol2.Q00;
03401 
03402         U += pol1.Q00 * T00_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03403         U += pol1.Q00 * T00_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03404         U += pol1.Q00 * T00_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03405     }
03406 
03407     if (pol1._rank > 0) {
03408         if (a*u3 < 40.0) {
03409             U += pol1.Q1x * TU1x_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03410             U += pol1.Q1x * TU1x_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03411             U += pol1.Q1x * TU1x_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03412             U += pol1.Q1y * TU1y_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03413             U += pol1.Q1y * TU1y_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03414             U += pol1.Q1y * TU1y_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03415             U += pol1.Q1z * TU1z_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03416             U += pol1.Q1z * TU1z_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03417             U += pol1.Q1z * TU1z_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03418         }
03419         else {
03420             U += pol1.Q1x * T1x_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03421             U += pol1.Q1x * T1x_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03422             U += pol1.Q1x * T1x_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03423             U += pol1.Q1y * T1y_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03424             U += pol1.Q1y * T1y_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03425             U += pol1.Q1y * T1y_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03426             U += pol1.Q1z * T1z_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03427             U += pol1.Q1z * T1z_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03428             U += pol1.Q1z * T1z_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03429         }
03430     }
03431     if (pol2._rank > 0) {
03432         if (a*u3 < 40.0) {
03433             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03434             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03435             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03436             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03437             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03438             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03439             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03440             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03441             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03442         }
03443         else {
03444             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03445             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03446             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03447             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03448             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03449             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03450             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03451             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03452             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03453         }
03454     }
03455 
03456     if (pol1._rank > 1) {
03457         if (a*u3 < 40.0) {
03458             U += pol1.Q20  * TU20_1x()  * pol2.U1x;
03459             U += pol1.Q20  * TU20_1y()  * pol2.U1y;
03460             U += pol1.Q20  * TU20_1z()  * pol2.U1z;
03461             U += pol1.Q21c * TU21c_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03462             U += pol1.Q21c * TU21c_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03463             U += pol1.Q21c * TU21c_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03464             U += pol1.Q21s * TU21s_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03465             U += pol1.Q21s * TU21s_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03466             U += pol1.Q21s * TU21s_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03467             U += pol1.Q22c * TU22c_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03468             U += pol1.Q22c * TU22c_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03469             U += pol1.Q22c * TU22c_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03470             U += pol1.Q22s * TU22s_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03471             U += pol1.Q22s * TU22s_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03472             U += pol1.Q22s * TU22s_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03473         }
03474         else {
03475             U += pol1.Q20  * T20_1x()  * pol2.U1x;
03476             U += pol1.Q20  * T20_1y()  * pol2.U1y;
03477             U += pol1.Q20  * T20_1z()  * pol2.U1z;
03478             U += pol1.Q21c * T21c_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03479             U += pol1.Q21c * T21c_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03480             U += pol1.Q21c * T21c_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03481             U += pol1.Q21s * T21s_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03482             U += pol1.Q21s * T21s_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03483             U += pol1.Q21s * T21s_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03484             U += pol1.Q22c * T22c_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03485             U += pol1.Q22c * T22c_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03486             U += pol1.Q22c * T22c_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03487             U += pol1.Q22s * T22s_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03488             U += pol1.Q22s * T22s_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03489             U += pol1.Q22s * T22s_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03490         }
03491     }
03492     if (pol2._rank > 1) {
03493         if (a*u3 < 40.0) {
03494             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_20()  * pol2.Q20;
03495             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03496             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03497             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03498             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03499             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_20()  * pol2.Q20;
03500             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03501             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03502             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03503             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03504             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_20()  * pol2.Q20;
03505             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03506             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03507             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03508             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03509         }
03510         else {
03511             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_20()  * pol2.Q20;
03512             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03513             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03514             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03515             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03516             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_20()  * pol2.Q20;
03517             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03518             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03519             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03520             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03521             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_20()  * pol2.Q20;
03522             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03523             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03524             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03525             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03526         }
03527     }
03528     
03529     // Take into account work needed to induce multipoles
03530     U *= 0.5;
03531 
03532     EU_INTRA += U;
03533     return U;
03534 }
03535 
03539 inline double EMultipole::Interactor::EnergyInter(PolarSite &pol1,
03540                                                    PolarSite &pol2) {
03541 
03542     // NOTE >>> e12 points from polar site 1 to polar site 2 <<< NOTE //
03543     e12  = _top->PbShortestConnect(pol1.getPos(), pol2.getPos());
03544     R    = 1/abs(e12);
03545     R2   = R*R;
03546     R3   = R2*R;
03547     R4   = R3*R;
03548     R5   = R4*R;
03549     e12 *= R;
03550 
03551     // Thole damping init.
03552     a    = _em->_aDamp;
03553     u3   = 1 / (R3 * sqrt(pol1.P1 * pol2.P1));
03554 
03555 
03556     //cout << "frag1 " << pol1.getFragment()->getId() << endl;
03557     //cout << "frag2 " << pol2.getFragment()->getId() << endl;
03558     //cout << "seg1  " << pol1.getSegment()->getId() << endl;
03559     //cout << "seg2  " << pol2.getSegment()->getId() << endl;    
03560 
03561     
03562 //        rax =   pol1._locX * e12;
03563 //        ray =   pol1._locY * e12;
03564 //        raz =   pol1._locZ * e12;
03565 //        rbx = - pol2._locX * e12;
03566 //        rby = - pol2._locY * e12;
03567 //        rbz = - pol2._locZ * e12;
03568 
03569         rax = e12.getX();
03570         ray = e12.getY();
03571         raz = e12.getZ();
03572         rbx = - rax;
03573         rby = - ray;
03574         rbz = - raz;
03575 
03576     if (pol1._rank > 0 || pol2._rank > 0) {
03577 //        cxx = pol1._locX * pol2._locX;
03578 //        cxy = pol1._locX * pol2._locY;
03579 //        cxz = pol1._locX * pol2._locZ;
03580 //        cyx = pol1._locY * pol2._locX;
03581 //        cyy = pol1._locY * pol2._locY;
03582 //        cyz = pol1._locY * pol2._locZ;
03583 //        czx = pol1._locZ * pol2._locX;
03584 //        czy = pol1._locZ * pol2._locY;
03585 //        czz = pol1._locZ * pol2._locZ;
03586 
03587         cxx = 1;
03588         cxy = 0;
03589         cxz = 0;
03590         cyx = 0;
03591         cyy = 1;
03592         cyz = 0;
03593         czx = 0;
03594         czy = 0;
03595         czz = 1;
03596     }
03597 
03598     double E = 0.0; // <- Electrostatic energy
03599     double U = 0.0; // <- Induction energy
03600 
03601         //cout << "r1  " << pol1.getPos() << endl;
03602         //cout << "r2  " << pol2.getPos() << endl;
03603         //cout << "R   " << 1/R << endl;
03604         //cout << "e12 " << e12 << endl;
03605 
03606         E += pol1.Q00 * T00_00() * pol2.Q00;
03607 
03608         //cout << "E up to q <-> q " << E << endl;
03609 
03610     if (a*u3 < 40) {
03611         U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_00() * pol2.Q00;
03612         U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_00() * pol2.Q00;
03613         U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_00() * pol2.Q00;
03614 
03615         U += pol1.Q00 * TU00_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03616         U += pol1.Q00 * TU00_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03617         U += pol1.Q00 * TU00_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03618     }
03619     else {
03620         U += pol1.U1x * T1x_00() * pol2.Q00;
03621         U += pol1.U1y * T1y_00() * pol2.Q00;
03622         U += pol1.U1z * T1z_00() * pol2.Q00;
03623 
03624         U += pol1.Q00 * T00_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03625         U += pol1.Q00 * T00_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03626         U += pol1.Q00 * T00_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03627     }
03628 
03629 
03630 
03631     if (pol1._rank > 0) {
03632         E += pol1.Q1x * T1x_00() * pol2.Q00;
03633         //cout << "E1x_00 " << pol1.Q1x * T1x_00() * pol2.Q00 << endl;
03634         E += pol1.Q1y * T1y_00() * pol2.Q00;
03635         //cout << "E1y_00 " << pol1.Q1y * T1y_00() * pol2.Q00 << endl;
03636         E += pol1.Q1z * T1z_00() * pol2.Q00;
03637         //cout << "E1z_00 " << pol1.Q1z * T1z_00() * pol2.Q00 << endl;
03638     }
03639 
03640     if (pol2._rank > 0) {
03641         E += pol1.Q00 * T00_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03642         //cout << "E00_1x " << pol1.Q00 * T00_1x() * pol2.Q1x << endl;
03643         E += pol1.Q00 * T00_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03644         //cout << "E00_1y " << pol1.Q00 * T00_1y() * pol2.Q1y << endl;
03645         E += pol1.Q00 * T00_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03646         //cout << "E00_1z " << pol1.Q00 * T00_1z() * pol2.Q1z << endl;
03647     }
03648         //cout << "E up to q <-> d " << E << endl;
03649 
03650     if (pol1._rank > 1) {
03651         E += pol1.Q20  * T20_00()  * pol2.Q00;
03652         E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_00() * pol2.Q00;
03653         E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_00() * pol2.Q00;
03654         E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_00() * pol2.Q00;
03655         E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_00() * pol2.Q00;
03656     }
03657 
03658     if (pol2._rank > 1) {
03659         E += pol1.Q00 * T00_20()  * pol2.Q20;
03660         E += pol1.Q00 * T00_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03661         E += pol1.Q00 * T00_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03662         E += pol1.Q00 * T00_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03663         E += pol1.Q00 * T00_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03664     }
03665         //cout << "E up to q <-> Q " << E << endl;
03666 
03667     if (pol1._rank > 0 && pol2._rank > 0) {
03668         E += pol1.Q1x * T1x_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03669         //cout << "E1x_1x " << pol1.Q1x * T1x_1x() * pol2.Q1x << endl;
03670         E += pol1.Q1x * T1x_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03671         //cout << "E1x_1y " << pol1.Q1x * T1x_1y() * pol2.Q1y << endl;
03672         E += pol1.Q1x * T1x_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03673         //cout << "E1x_1z " << pol1.Q1x * T1x_1z() * pol2.Q1z << endl;
03674 
03675         E += pol1.Q1y * T1y_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03676         //cout << "E1y_1x " << pol1.Q1y * T1y_1x() * pol2.Q1x << endl;
03677         E += pol1.Q1y * T1y_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03678         //cout << "E1y_1y " << pol1.Q1y * T1y_1y() * pol2.Q1y << endl;
03679         E += pol1.Q1y * T1y_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03680         //cout << "E1y_1z " << pol1.Q1y * T1y_1z() * pol2.Q1z << endl;
03681 
03682         E += pol1.Q1z * T1z_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03683         //cout << "E1z_1x " << pol1.Q1z * T1z_1x() * pol2.Q1x << endl;
03684         E += pol1.Q1z * T1z_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03685         //cout << "E1z_1y " << pol1.Q1z * T1z_1y() * pol2.Q1y << endl;
03686         E += pol1.Q1z * T1z_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03687         //cout << "E1z_1z " << pol1.Q1z * T1z_1z() * pol2.Q1z << endl;
03688     }
03689 
03690     if (pol1._rank > 0) {
03691         if (a*u3 < 40) {
03692             U += pol1.Q1x * TU1x_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03693             U += pol1.Q1x * TU1x_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03694             U += pol1.Q1x * TU1x_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03695             U += pol1.Q1y * TU1y_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03696             U += pol1.Q1y * TU1y_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03697             U += pol1.Q1y * TU1y_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03698             U += pol1.Q1z * TU1z_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03699             U += pol1.Q1z * TU1z_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03700             U += pol1.Q1z * TU1z_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03701         }
03702         else {
03703             U += pol1.Q1x * T1x_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03704             U += pol1.Q1x * T1x_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03705             U += pol1.Q1x * T1x_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03706             U += pol1.Q1y * T1y_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03707             U += pol1.Q1y * T1y_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03708             U += pol1.Q1y * T1y_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03709             U += pol1.Q1z * T1z_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03710             U += pol1.Q1z * T1z_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03711             U += pol1.Q1z * T1z_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03712         }
03713     }
03714     if (pol2._rank > 0) {
03715         if (a*u3 < 40) {
03716             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03717             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03718             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03719             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03720             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03721             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03722             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03723             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03724             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03725         }
03726         else {
03727             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03728             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03729             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03730             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03731             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03732             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03733             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03734             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03735             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03736         }
03737     }    
03738         //cout << "E up to d <-> d " << E << endl;
03739 
03740     if (pol1._rank > 1 && pol2._rank > 0) {
03741         E += pol1.Q20 * T20_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03742         E += pol1.Q20 * T20_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03743         E += pol1.Q20 * T20_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03744 
03745         E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03746         E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03747         E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03748 
03749         E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03750         E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03751         E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03752 
03753         E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03754         E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03755         E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03756 
03757         E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03758         E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03759         E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03760     }
03761 
03762     if (pol1._rank > 0 && pol2._rank > 1) {
03763         E += pol1.Q1x * T1x_20() * pol2.Q20;
03764         E += pol1.Q1y * T1y_20() * pol2.Q20;
03765         E += pol1.Q1z * T1z_20() * pol2.Q20;
03766 
03767         E += pol1.Q1x * T1x_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03768         E += pol1.Q1y * T1y_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03769         E += pol1.Q1z * T1z_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03770 
03771         E += pol1.Q1x * T1x_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03772         E += pol1.Q1y * T1y_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03773         E += pol1.Q1z * T1z_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03774 
03775         E += pol1.Q1x * T1x_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03776         E += pol1.Q1y * T1y_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03777         E += pol1.Q1z * T1z_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03778 
03779         E += pol1.Q1x * T1x_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03780         E += pol1.Q1y * T1y_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03781         E += pol1.Q1z * T1z_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03782     }
03783 
03784     if (pol1._rank > 1) {
03785         if (a*u3 < 40.0) {
03786             U += pol1.Q20  * TU20_1x()  * pol2.U1x;
03787             U += pol1.Q20  * TU20_1y()  * pol2.U1y;
03788             U += pol1.Q20  * TU20_1z()  * pol2.U1z;
03789             U += pol1.Q21c * TU21c_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03790             U += pol1.Q21c * TU21c_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03791             U += pol1.Q21c * TU21c_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03792             U += pol1.Q21s * TU21s_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03793             U += pol1.Q21s * TU21s_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03794             U += pol1.Q21s * TU21s_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03795             U += pol1.Q22c * TU22c_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03796             U += pol1.Q22c * TU22c_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03797             U += pol1.Q22c * TU22c_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03798             U += pol1.Q22s * TU22s_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03799             U += pol1.Q22s * TU22s_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03800             U += pol1.Q22s * TU22s_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03801         }
03802         else {
03803             U += pol1.Q20  * T20_1x()  * pol2.U1x;
03804             U += pol1.Q20  * T20_1y()  * pol2.U1y;
03805             U += pol1.Q20  * T20_1z()  * pol2.U1z;
03806             U += pol1.Q21c * T21c_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03807             U += pol1.Q21c * T21c_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03808             U += pol1.Q21c * T21c_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03809             U += pol1.Q21s * T21s_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03810             U += pol1.Q21s * T21s_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03811             U += pol1.Q21s * T21s_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03812             U += pol1.Q22c * T22c_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03813             U += pol1.Q22c * T22c_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03814             U += pol1.Q22c * T22c_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03815             U += pol1.Q22s * T22s_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03816             U += pol1.Q22s * T22s_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03817             U += pol1.Q22s * T22s_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03818         }
03819     }
03820     if (pol2._rank > 1) {
03821         if (a*u3 < 40.0) {
03822             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_20()  * pol2.Q20;
03823             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03824             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03825             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03826             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03827             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_20()  * pol2.Q20;
03828             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03829             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03830             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03831             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03832             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_20()  * pol2.Q20;
03833             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03834             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03835             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03836             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03837         }
03838         else {
03839             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_20()  * pol2.Q20;
03840             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03841             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03842             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03843             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03844             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_20()  * pol2.Q20;
03845             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03846             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03847             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03848             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03849             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_20()  * pol2.Q20;
03850             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03851             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03852             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03853             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03854         }
03855     }
03856         //cout << "E up to d <-> Q " << E << endl;
03857 
03858     if (pol1._rank > 1 && pol2._rank > 1) {
03859         E += pol1.Q20  * T20_20()   * pol2.Q20;
03860         E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03861         E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03862         E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03863         E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03864 
03865 
03866         E += pol1.Q20  * T20_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03867         E += pol1.Q20  * T20_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03868         E += pol1.Q20  * T20_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03869         E += pol1.Q20  * T20_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03870         E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_20() * pol2.Q20;
03871         E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_20() * pol2.Q20;
03872         E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_20() * pol2.Q20;
03873         E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_20() * pol2.Q20;
03874 
03875 
03876         E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03877         E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03878         E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03879         E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03880         E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03881         E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03882 
03883 
03884         E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03885         E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03886         E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03887         E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03888 
03889         E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03890         E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03891     }
03892         //cout << "E up to Q <-> Q " << E << endl;
03893         
03894 
03895     // Take into account work required to induce multipoles
03896     U *= 0.5;
03897 
03898     EP += E;
03899     EU_INTER += U;
03900     return E + U;
03901 }
03902 
03906 inline double EMultipole::Interactor::EnergyInterESP(PolarSite &pol1,
03907                                                       PolarSite &pol2) {
03908     
03909     // NOTE >>> e12 points from polar site 1 to polar site 2 <<< NOTE //
03910     e12  = pol2.getPos() - pol1.getPos();
03911     R    = 1/abs(e12);
03912     R2   = R*R;
03913     R3   = R2*R;
03914     R4   = R3*R;
03915     R5   = R4*R;
03916     e12 *= R;
03917 
03918     // Thole damping init.
03919     a    = _em->_aDamp;
03920     u3   = 1 / (R3 * sqrt(pol1.P1 * pol2.P1));
03921 
03922         rax = e12.getX();
03923         ray = e12.getY();
03924         raz = e12.getZ();
03925         rbx = - rax;
03926         rby = - ray;
03927         rbz = - raz;
03928 
03929     if (pol1._rank > 0 || pol2._rank > 0) {
03930 
03931         cxx = 1;
03932         cxy = 0;
03933         cxz = 0;
03934         cyx = 0;
03935         cyy = 1;
03936         cyz = 0;
03937         czx = 0;
03938         czy = 0;
03939         czz = 1;
03940     }
03941 
03942     double E = 0.0; // <- Electrostatic energy
03943     double U = 0.0; // <- Induction energy
03944 
03945         E += pol1.Q00 * T00_00() * pol2.Q00;
03946 
03947     if (a*u3 < 40) {
03948         U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_00() * pol2.Q00;
03949         U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_00() * pol2.Q00;
03950         U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_00() * pol2.Q00;
03951 
03952         U += pol1.Q00 * TU00_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03953         U += pol1.Q00 * TU00_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03954         U += pol1.Q00 * TU00_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03955     }
03956     else {
03957         U += pol1.U1x * T1x_00() * pol2.Q00;
03958         U += pol1.U1y * T1y_00() * pol2.Q00;
03959         U += pol1.U1z * T1z_00() * pol2.Q00;
03960 
03961         U += pol1.Q00 * T00_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03962         U += pol1.Q00 * T00_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03963         U += pol1.Q00 * T00_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03964     }
03965 
03966 
03967 
03968     if (pol1._rank > 0) {
03969         E += pol1.Q1x * T1x_00() * pol2.Q00;
03970         E += pol1.Q1y * T1y_00() * pol2.Q00;
03971         E += pol1.Q1z * T1z_00() * pol2.Q00;
03972     }
03973 
03974     if (pol2._rank > 0) {
03975         E += pol1.Q00 * T00_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03976         E += pol1.Q00 * T00_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03977         E += pol1.Q00 * T00_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03978     }
03979 
03980     if (pol1._rank > 1) {
03981         E += pol1.Q20  * T20_00()  * pol2.Q00;
03982         E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_00() * pol2.Q00;
03983         E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_00() * pol2.Q00;
03984         E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_00() * pol2.Q00;
03985         E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_00() * pol2.Q00;
03986     }
03987 
03988     if (pol2._rank > 1) {
03989         E += pol1.Q00 * T00_20()  * pol2.Q20;
03990         E += pol1.Q00 * T00_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03991         E += pol1.Q00 * T00_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03992         E += pol1.Q00 * T00_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03993         E += pol1.Q00 * T00_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03994     }
03995 
03996     if (pol1._rank > 0 && pol2._rank > 0) {
03997         E += pol1.Q1x * T1x_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03998         E += pol1.Q1x * T1x_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03999         E += pol1.Q1x * T1x_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
04000 
04001         E += pol1.Q1y * T1y_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
04002         E += pol1.Q1y * T1y_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
04003         E += pol1.Q1y * T1y_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
04004 
04005         E += pol1.Q1z * T1z_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
04006         E += pol1.Q1z * T1z_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
04007         E += pol1.Q1z * T1z_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
04008     }
04009 
04010     if (pol1._rank > 0) {
04011         if (a*u3 < 40) {
04012             U += pol1.Q1x * TU1x_1x() * pol2.U1x;
04013             U += pol1.Q1x * TU1x_1y() * pol2.U1y;
04014             U += pol1.Q1x * TU1x_1z() * pol2.U1z;
04015             U += pol1.Q1y * TU1y_1x() * pol2.U1x;
04016             U += pol1.Q1y * TU1y_1y() * pol2.U1y;
04017             U += pol1.Q1y * TU1y_1z() * pol2.U1z;
04018             U += pol1.Q1z * TU1z_1x() * pol2.U1x;
04019             U += pol1.Q1z * TU1z_1y() * pol2.U1y;
04020             U += pol1.Q1z * TU1z_1z() * pol2.U1z;
04021         }
04022         else {
04023             U += pol1.Q1x * T1x_1x() * pol2.U1x;
04024             U += pol1.Q1x * T1x_1y() * pol2.U1y;
04025             U += pol1.Q1x * T1x_1z() * pol2.U1z;
04026             U += pol1.Q1y * T1y_1x() * pol2.U1x;
04027             U += pol1.Q1y * T1y_1y() * pol2.U1y;
04028             U += pol1.Q1y * T1y_1z() * pol2.U1z;
04029             U += pol1.Q1z * T1z_1x() * pol2.U1x;
04030             U += pol1.Q1z * T1z_1y() * pol2.U1y;
04031             U += pol1.Q1z * T1z_1z() * pol2.U1z;
04032         }
04033     }
04034     if (pol2._rank > 0) {
04035         if (a*u3 < 40) {
04036             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
04037             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
04038             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
04039             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
04040             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
04041             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
04042             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
04043             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
04044             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
04045         }
04046         else {
04047             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
04048             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
04049             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
04050             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
04051             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
04052             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
04053             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
04054             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
04055             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
04056         }
04057     }
04058 
04059     if (pol1._rank > 1 && pol2._rank > 0) {
04060         E += pol1.Q20 * T20_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
04061         E += pol1.Q20 * T20_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
04062         E += pol1.Q20 * T20_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
04063 
04064         E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
04065         E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
04066         E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
04067 
04068         E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
04069         E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
04070         E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
04071 
04072         E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
04073         E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
04074         E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
04075 
04076         E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
04077         E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
04078         E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
04079     }
04080 
04081     if (pol1._rank > 0 && pol2._rank > 1) {
04082         E += pol1.Q1x * T1x_20() * pol2.Q20;
04083         E += pol1.Q1y * T1y_20() * pol2.Q20;
04084         E += pol1.Q1z * T1z_20() * pol2.Q20;
04085 
04086         E += pol1.Q1x * T1x_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
04087         E += pol1.Q1y * T1y_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
04088         E += pol1.Q1z * T1z_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
04089 
04090         E += pol1.Q1x * T1x_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
04091         E += pol1.Q1y * T1y_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
04092         E += pol1.Q1z * T1z_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
04093 
04094         E += pol1.Q1x * T1x_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
04095         E += pol1.Q1y * T1y_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
04096         E += pol1.Q1z * T1z_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
04097 
04098         E += pol1.Q1x * T1x_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
04099         E += pol1.Q1y * T1y_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
04100         E += pol1.Q1z * T1z_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
04101     }
04102 
04103     if (pol1._rank > 1) {
04104         if (a*u3 < 40.0) {
04105             U += pol1.Q20  * TU20_1x()  * pol2.U1x;
04106             U += pol1.Q20  * TU20_1y()  * pol2.U1y;
04107             U += pol1.Q20  * TU20_1z()  * pol2.U1z;
04108             U += pol1.Q21c * TU21c_1x() * pol2.U1x;
04109             U += pol1.Q21c * TU21c_1y() * pol2.U1y;
04110             U += pol1.Q21c * TU21c_1z() * pol2.U1z;
04111             U += pol1.Q21s * TU21s_1x() * pol2.U1x;
04112             U += pol1.Q21s * TU21s_1y() * pol2.U1y;
04113             U += pol1.Q21s * TU21s_1z() * pol2.U1z;
04114             U += pol1.Q22c * TU22c_1x() * pol2.U1x;
04115             U += pol1.Q22c * TU22c_1y() * pol2.U1y;
04116             U += pol1.Q22c * TU22c_1z() * pol2.U1z;
04117             U += pol1.Q22s * TU22s_1x() * pol2.U1x;
04118             U += pol1.Q22s * TU22s_1y() * pol2.U1y;
04119             U += pol1.Q22s * TU22s_1z() * pol2.U1z;
04120         }
04121         else {
04122             U += pol1.Q20  * T20_1x()  * pol2.U1x;
04123             U += pol1.Q20  * T20_1y()  * pol2.U1y;
04124             U += pol1.Q20  * T20_1z()  * pol2.U1z;
04125             U += pol1.Q21c * T21c_1x() * pol2.U1x;
04126             U += pol1.Q21c * T21c_1y() * pol2.U1y;
04127             U += pol1.Q21c * T21c_1z() * pol2.U1z;
04128             U += pol1.Q21s * T21s_1x() * pol2.U1x;
04129             U += pol1.Q21s * T21s_1y() * pol2.U1y;
04130             U += pol1.Q21s * T21s_1z() * pol2.U1z;
04131             U += pol1.Q22c * T22c_1x() * pol2.U1x;
04132             U += pol1.Q22c * T22c_1y() * pol2.U1y;
04133             U += pol1.Q22c * T22c_1z() * pol2.U1z;
04134             U += pol1.Q22s * T22s_1x() * pol2.U1x;
04135             U += pol1.Q22s * T22s_1y() * pol2.U1y;
04136             U += pol1.Q22s * T22s_1z() * pol2.U1z;
04137         }
04138     }
04139     if (pol2._rank > 1) {
04140         if (a*u3 < 40.0) {
04141             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_20()  * pol2.Q20;
04142             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
04143             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
04144             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
04145             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
04146             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_20()  * pol2.Q20;
04147             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
04148             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
04149             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
04150             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
04151             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_20()  * pol2.Q20;
04152             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
04153             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
04154             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
04155             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
04156         }
04157         else {
04158             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_20()  * pol2.Q20;
04159             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
04160             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
04161             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
04162             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
04163             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_20()  * pol2.Q20;
04164             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
04165             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
04166             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
04167             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
04168             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_20()  * pol2.Q20;
04169             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
04170             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
04171             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
04172             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
04173         }
04174     }
04175 
04176     if (pol1._rank > 1 && pol2._rank > 1) {
04177         E += pol1.Q20  * T20_20()   * pol2.Q20;
04178         E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
04179         E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
04180         E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
04181         E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
04182 
04183 
04184         E += pol1.Q20  * T20_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
04185         E += pol1.Q20  * T20_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
04186         E += pol1.Q20  * T20_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
04187         E += pol1.Q20  * T20_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
04188         E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_20() * pol2.Q20;
04189         E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_20() * pol2.Q20;
04190         E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_20() * pol2.Q20;
04191         E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_20() * pol2.Q20;
04192 
04193 
04194         E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
04195         E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
04196         E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
04197         E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
04198         E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
04199         E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
04200 
04201 
04202         E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
04203         E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
04204         E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
04205         E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
04206 
04207         E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
04208         E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
04209     }
04210 
04211     // Take into account work required to induce multipoles
04212     U *= 0.5;
04213 
04214     return E + U;
04215 }
